T13TD4312.1E:132a-20: sa rlung zhes bya ba 'byung bas dang rlung gi shas che ba las ni ro bska ba 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.1E:132a-21: de lta na gnyis gnyis las 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:132a-22: shas che zhes smos pas na ro thams cad kyang 'byung ba las gyur pa yin par ston to //
T13TD4312.1E:132a-23: des na tshogs pa las byung ba yin yang shas che ba'i shas rdzogs par byas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:132a-24: gang du gang zhig shas che ba ste der ro'i khyad par gzhan bskyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:132a-25: de ltar na shas che ba'i dbang gis na ro mngar ba ni 'byung pa thams cad kyis bskyed du zin kyang /
T13TD4312.1E:132a-26: sa dang chu las byung ba yin zhes bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:132a-27: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:132a-28: da ni mngar ba la sogs pa 'byung ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang las bstan pa'i phyir smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-0: de las ro ni mngar ba dag / gang zhig @132b myangs pa'i tshe na ni //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-1: kha la chags shing lus kyang ni //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-2: tshim byed dbang po rab dang byed //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-3: grog ma la sogs dga' ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-5: ro drug bo de dag gi nang nas ro mngar bdag tu shes par bya ba ni gang zhig myangs shing lce dang phrad bar gyur ba na /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-6: kha la chags shing 'byar bag can du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-7: de bzhin du lus kyang tshim zhing bde bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-8: dbang po rnams rab tu dang zhing dga' bar byad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-9: de bzhin du grog ma la sogs srog chags phra mo rnams kyang dga' zhing sred par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-10: skyur ba kha nas chu 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-11: so brtse spu ni ldang ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-12: mig dang smin ma 'dzum par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-14: ro skur ba ni myangs pa'i tshe kha nas chu 'dzag cing /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-16: de bzhin du so brtse ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-17: spu ldang bar byed ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-18: mig gnyis dang smin ma gnyis 'dzum zhing sdud par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-19: lan tshva khar ni mchil ma 'du //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-20: mkhur ba gre ba tsha bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-22: ro lan tshva ni lces myangs pa na khar mchil ma 'du zhing 'dzag pa dang mkhur ba dang gre ba tsha bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-23: kha ba kha yi dri ma spyod //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-24: lce ni 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-26: ro kha ba ni myangs par gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-27: kha'i dri ma sbyong [?] zhing dag par byed de /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-28: ljan ljin sel ba yin zhing lce 'joms te /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-29: ro gzhan 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa 'jig par byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-30: rang gi las kyi nus pa nye bar 'joms par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-31: tsha ba lce rtse skyo byed cing //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-32: tsag tsag byed par 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-33: kha mig sna las 'dzag byed cing //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-34: mkhur ba sreg bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-36: ro tsha ba ni lce la myangs pa'i lce'i rtse mo skyo bar byed cing na bar byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-37: lce bem bem por byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-38: tsag tsag byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-39: me lce la reg pa ltar lam lam por byed pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-40: ske tsho'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag por byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:132b-41: de bzhin du kha dang mi sha dang sna las chu 'dzag par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:132b-42: mkhur ba me lces phog pa ltar sreg par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-0: bska bas lce ni bem por @133a * //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-2: / gre ba rtsa sbu bas 'gags par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-4: ro bska ba ni lces myangs pa na lce bem bem por byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-5: ro ji lta ba bzhin du tshor bar gyur pa las nyams bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-6: de bzhin du gre ba dang rtsa'i sbubs 'gags par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-7: ro yi tshul ni de dag ste //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-9: ro rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas de dag gi rang bzhin nyid kyi don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i tshig tu slob dpon gyis smras pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-10: mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro'i tshul ni sngar bshad pa'i rnam ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-11: las ni ro mngar ba dag gis //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-12: skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-13: lus zungs mthu stobs rab skyed cing //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-14: byis pa rgan po glo rdol skem //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-15: mdog mdangs skra dang dbang po bzang //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-16: lus brtas skad 'gags phan zhing lci //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-17: nu zho skyed cing rma 'byor byed //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-18: tshe ring 'tsho byed snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-19: rlung dang mkhris pa dug rnams sel //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-20: ha cang drags na tshil bcas dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-21: bad kan las byung nad skyed cing //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-22: lus sbom drod 'bri chang nad dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-23: gcin nad lba ba rme na sogs skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-25: ro mngar ba bsten cing spyad na las 'di dag byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-26: de yang skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-27: skyes pa nas brtsams te 'phrod cing rjes su mthun pa yin pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-28: bcud kyi dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi mthu stobs rab tu skyed par byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-29: nus pa khyad bar can dang ldan pa'i stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-30: de bzhin du rtag tu byis pa dang rgan po glo rgol ba dang skem ba dang mdog mdangs dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-31: skra dang dbang po rnams la bzang zhing bsngags par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:133a-32: de bzhin du lus brtas par byed pa dang skad 'gags pa'i lkog ma la phan pa dang bud med kyi nu zho skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-33: rma dang rus pa chag ba 'byor zhing 'tsho bar byed ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-34: tshe ring bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-35: 'tsho bar byed cing mdangs skyed ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133a-36: snum pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-0: de bzhin du rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad dang dug las gyur pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed pa @133b yin no ;
T13TD4312.1E:133b-1: / yang ro mngar ba de ha cang drags shing shas cher bsten par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-2: tshil dang bad kan las byung ba'i nad rnams skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-3: lus sbom ba la sogs bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-4: chang nad ni 'og nas bshad do //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-5: de la sogs ba skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-6: skyur ba me drod skyed byed snum //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-8: dro ba'i nus skyed reg pa bsil //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-9: tshim byed 'drul byed yang ba ste //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-10: bad kan khrag mkhris rgyas par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-11: rlung 'gags rgyu bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-12: de ni shin tu bsten drags na //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-13: lus lhod rab rib mgo 'khor dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:133b-14: ; g-yan pa skya rbab me dbal dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-15: 'or nad thor bu skom rims skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-17: ro skyur ba bsten cing spyad na /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-18: khong pa'i me drod skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-19: de bzhin du snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-20: zhim zhing sems dga' bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-21: kha zas 'ju zhing smin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-22: yi ga 'byed cing zas len pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-23: de bzhin du dro ba'i nus pa skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-24: bskus na reg pa kha ba ltar bsil ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-26: kha zas 'drul zhing sla bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-27: de bzhin du yang ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-28: bad kan dang mkhris pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-29: khrag rgyas par byad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-30: de bzhin du rlung lam 'gags shing 'khyil ba dag bde bar rgyu bar byed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-31: ro skyur ba de ni shin tu bsten drags shing shas cher zos na lus lhod cing mi mkhregs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-32: de bzhin du rab rib la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-33: lan tshva sra dang 'khyil ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-35: snum dang dugs kyis rdul zhing rno //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-37: de ni drags pas rlung khrag dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-38: skra 'byi skra dkar gnyer ma dang //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-39: skom mdze dug dang me dbal rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-40: skyed cing stobs ni 'dri [?] bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-42: ro lan tshva can bsten cing longs spyad na /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-43: sra ba 'byin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:133b-45: 'gags pa 'byin par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:133b-46: de la sra ba ni rengs shing 'gyur mi shas ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-0: 'khyil ba ni bshang ba la sogs @134a * //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-1: pa'i tshogs pa 'khyil zhing 'byung du mi btub pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-2: 'gags pa ni rtsa sbubs rnams 'gags pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-3: de dag 'byin cing sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-4: de bzhin du drod skyed de me'i shas 'phel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-6: dugs kyis rdul 'byin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-7: rno zhing 'jug pa myur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-8: yi ga 'byed cing zas 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-9: gcod cing kha gnyis su byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-11: lan tshva'i ro de drags shing shas cher bsten pas rlung dang khrag gi nad dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-12: de bzhin du skra 'byi zhing spyi ther du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-13: rgas sra ba'i mtshan ma skra dkar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-14: gnyer ma zhes pa pags pa 'dus pa dag byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-15: de bzhin du skom dad la sogs pa skyed par byed cing /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-16: stobs 'bri zhing 'jig par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-17: kha ba rang nyid zhim min zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-18: yi ga 'chus dang srin skom dug /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-19: mdze dang brgyal dang rims slon bro //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-20: tsha dang mkhris pa bad kan 'joms //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-21: 'drul dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-22: bshang dang gci ba skems pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-23: yang zhing yid gzhungs bsil zhing rtsub //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-24: nu ma'i nad dang skad 'gags sel //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-25: de ni shin tu drags gyur nas //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-26: lus zungs zad cing rlung nad skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-28: ro kha ba ni rang nyid zhim pa ma yin zhing yi ga 'byed par byed ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-29: rang nyid yi gar mi 'ong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-30: de bzhin yi ga 'chus pa nas bad kan gyi bar du 'joms par byed ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-31: de bzhin 'drul ba la sogs bzhu zhing gsher ba'i tshul can dag skem par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-32: de bzhin du ba zhin yang ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-33: yid gzhungs shing shes rab 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-34: bsil zhing grang ba'i nus pa skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-35: de bzhin du rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-36: bud med kyi nu ma'i nad dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-37: skad 'gags pa'i lkog ma'i nad sel zhing 'joms pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-38: ro kha ba de shin tu drags par bsten cing goms par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-39: lus zungs dangs ma la sogs pa zad cing 'bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134a-40: rlung las gyur ba'i nad rnams skyed cing 'byin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-41: tsha bas lkog nad 'gags pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:134a-42: mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad sel //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-0: @134b rma 'jig byed cing snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-1: tshil dang 'drul bag skems par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-3: sbyong zhing zas ni 'jig par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-4: 'ching ba gcod cing rtsa sbubs dag / rnam par 'byed cing bad kan sel //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-5: de ni shin tu drags gyur bas //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-6: skom skyed khu ba stobs zad cing //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-8: rked pa rgya ba sogs na bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-10: ro tsha bas ni lkog ma'i nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-11: lkog nad ni lkog ma'i phyogs su byung ba'i nad do //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-12: 'gags pa ni brang 'gags shing bad kan gyis rgyas pa las byung ba'i nad la bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-13: la la ni grang ba'i 'dar nad la au dar du zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-14: gzhan dag ni grang pa'i dus su khyad par du /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-15: grang ba chu yi reg pa las //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-16: lkog mar skrangs par gyur pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-17: gag ba zhes bya bad kan 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-19: / ma zhu ba ni ma zhu ba be'u snabs can no //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-21: rma shin tu mtho ba'i skrangs bag can 'dzum zhing 'bri bar byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-22: yang rma 'byor ba dag gi gags byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-23: de bzhin du snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-24: tshil la sogs pa skems shing 'bri bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-25: me'i drod skyed cing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-26: ma zhu ba zhu bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-27: kha zas yi ga 'byed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-31: rno bas lhu tshigs kyi 'ching ba dam po lhod bar byed ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-32: rtsa sbubs kyi kha rnam bar 'byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-33: bad kan sel zhing 'joms pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-34: tsha ba de shin tu drags par bsten cing zos pas ni skom dad skyed pa la sogs pa byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-35: brgyal ba ni rmongs bar gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-36: lus 'khums ba ni yan lag 'jas ba ltar gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-38: rked pa dang rgyab na ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-39: de dag tu gzer ba la sogs pa mi bzad pas 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-40: sogs pa'i sgras ni rkang ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:134b-41: rtsib logs na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-42: bska bas mkhris ba bad kan sel //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-43: lci zhing khrag nad rnam bar sbyong //
T13TD4312.1E:134b-44: skem zhing rma 'tsho bsil ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-1: dang tshil ni rnam bar skems //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-2: be'u snabs 'khyil cing sri bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-3: rtsub cing pags mdog rab dang byed //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-4: de ni shin tu bsten drags na //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-5: bshad 'gags lto sbos snying nad dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-6: skom dang skem zhing skyes mthu nyams //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-7: rtsa sgo 'gags shing dri ma sri //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-9: ro ba ska ba bsten cing spyad pas ni /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-10: mkhris pha bad kan sel zhing 'joms par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-11: lci pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-12: khrag gi nad rnam par sbyong pa sogs pa byed ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-13: be'u snabs 'khyil zhing thogs ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-14: bshad ba sri bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-15: de bzhin du shin tu rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-16: pags pa'i mdog rab tu dangs zhing mdog gsal bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-17: ro bska ba de bsten pa drags shing shas cher zos na bshang ba 'gag pa la sogs pa skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-18: skyes bu'i mthu nyams shing khu ba zad par 'gyur ba dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:135a-20: gcin dang phyi sa 'gags par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-21: mngar ba la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi sde tshan smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-22: zhun mar bu ram star ga gser //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-23: mo tsa tso tsa pa ru sha / nye'u shing ra mnye ba nas //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-24: ra dza dan ba la gsum //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-25: me da gnyis dang parni bzhi //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-26: 'tsho byed dzi ba ri sho ba //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-27: shing mngar ma du ka pim bi //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-28: shra ba ni gnyis bi da ri //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-29: cu gang kishar shu ku la //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-31: 'o ma bu ram shing gze ma //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-32: rgun 'brum sbrang sogs mngar ba'i sde //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-34: zhun mar nas rgun 'bru'i bar gyi sde tshan ni rdzas mngar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-35: sman mngar po yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-36: de la mo tsa ni chu shing gi 'bras bu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-37: tso tsa ni rgya skyegs gyi 'bras bu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-38: nye'u shing ni aa bi ru'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-39: ra mnye ba nas ni bi ra'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-40: ra dza dan ni ba na ya bri ya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-44: me da gnyis ni med dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-46: parni bzhi ni sal parni dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135a-51: dzi ba ka ni kur tsa shir sha'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-52: ri sho ba ni bi la bar dha'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135a-53: ma du ka ni ma du ka'i me tog go //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-0: @135b bim bi ni tun ta ke ri'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-4: bi da ri ni kashi da ri'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-5: cu gang ni tu ka kashi ra'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-8: mah'a gnyis ni ma h'a sa ha dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135b-10: 'o ma can ni 'o ma yod ba'i phyir 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-11: kashma ri ni kad pa la'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-12: gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-13: skyur ba skyu ru aamil ka / ba lung dang ni star bu dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-14: se'u 'bru rdul dang dar ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-15: tsha dang ku shu aa mra dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-16: aamal ta ka bha bya dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-17: kar ma rda ka bid tha'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-19: skyur ra nas ka bid tha'i bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni sman skyur ba'i sde tshan yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-20: aamli ka ni tsu kri ka'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-21: ba lung ni pi za pu ra'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-22: gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-23: tsha mchog rtsal ru kha ru tsha //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-24: bid rgya mtsho bkod pa'i tsha //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-25: mtsho tsha skam tsha ro nye dang //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-26: kasha ra lan tshva'i sde tshan yin //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-28: tsha mchog nas lan tshva'i bar ni /
T13TD4312.1E:135b-29: tsha'i sde tshan gyi sman gyi / tshogs so //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-30: tsha mchog ni rgyam tsha dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135b-32: rtsal ru tsha ni so bar tsa la ste /
T13TD4312.1E:135b-33: ming gi rnam grangs ru tsik zhes bya'o ;
T13TD4312.1E:135b-34: / kha ru tsha ni tsha nag po'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-35: bid ni kha ru tsha nag po dri mi zhim pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-36: rgya mtsho'i tsha nis mu tra la wa na'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-37: ro nye zhes bya ba ni zha nye nag po'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-40: kha ba kyi lce pa to la //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-41: tsandan aur shi ba le ka / ci skrigs nim pa pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-42: rgya spos aa kar ba tsak / nag ta mal ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-43: gla sgang mur ba ba sha ka ;
T13TD4312.1E:135b-44: / aa pa marga po son cha //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-45: 'khar lcags sle tres byi tsher ba //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-46: rtsa ba che lnga bya gri gnyis //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-47: bong nga shu dag bi shal //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-49: kyi lce ba nas bi sha la'i bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni sman kha ba'i sde tshoms so //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-50: ci skrigs ni ka ri ta tig ta'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-51: nag ta ma la ni ka ranydza'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-52: ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-53: ba sha ka ni aang ta ru sha ka'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-54: byi tsher ba ni dur la ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-55: rtsa ba chen po lnga ni /
T13TD4312.1E:135b-56: bil ba dang ka kasha ri la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-57: bya gri ni bri ha ti dang /
T13TD4312.1E:135b-59: tsha ba shing kun na le sham //
T13TD4312.1E:135b-60: byi dang ga dang tsha ba lnga //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-2: mkhris ba gcin dang go bye yin //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-4: shing kun nas go bye'i bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-5: sman tsha ba'i sde tshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-6: tsha ba lnga ni bi bi ling dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-7: pi pi ling m'u la dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-11: / ku the ra sogs ldum rngad sngo zhes bya ba ni tshod ma'i nang nas ldum gyi sngo rngad ku the ra dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-13: byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-14: mkhris pa ni ri dags dang bya la sogs pa'i mkhris pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-15: gcin ni ba lang dang ra lug la sogs pa'i gcin rnam pa brgyad do //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-16: go bye ba ni pa la ka zhes bya ba bse shing 'bras bu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-17: bska tshan aa ru ba ru ra //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-18: sbrang rtsi seng ldeng shi ri sha / ka dam au dumb'a ra dang //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-19: mu tig byi ru aan tsan btsag / ka bid ta gzhon khar dzu ra //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-22: aa ru ra nas autpa la'i bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni ro bska ba'i sman gyi tshogs so //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-23: aan tsan ni lig bu mig dang dngul rdo'o //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-24: btsag ni su bar na gi ri ste /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-26: ka bid tha gzhon zhes bya ba ni ba li ka bid tha gzhon nu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-27: khar dzu ra zhes bya ba ni ka bid tha rlon pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-28: khar dzu ra ma smin pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-29: 'bras rnying nas rnying gro rnying dang //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-30: mungga sbrang rtsi sha kha ra //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-31: skam sa'i sha rnams ma gtogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-32: mngar ba phal cher bad kan skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-34: mar la sogs pa'i sman ro mngar 'phal mo che de dag ni /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-35: bad kan skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-43: skam sa'i sha rnams ni ma gtogs te /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-44: 'di dag mngar yang bad kan mi skyed kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-45: de las gzhan pa'i mngar ba phal cher bad kan skyed ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-47: skyur ba phal cher mkhris pa skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:136a-49: gang skyur ba'i sman phal cher zhes ba mang du ste /
T13TD4312.1E:136a-50: ma du lung ga la sogs pa gang yin bde thams cad mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-0: rgyam tsha lce myang @136b tsha ma gtogs //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-1: lan tshva phal cher mig la gnod //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-4: lce myang tsha ni mig la phan no zhes don gyi shugs kyis ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-5: sle tres ba to la bca' sga //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-6: sgog skya pi pi ling ma gtogs //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-7: kha dang tsha ba phal cher ni //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-8: ro tsa 'dri zhing rlung skyed yin //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-10: sman kha ba dang tsha ba thams cad las phal cher te ro tsa zhing khu ba 'phel ba la gnod cing 'bri bar byed ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-11: de bzhin du rlung skyed par byed pa yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-12: gzhan du na sman kha ba'i nang na sle tres dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-13: pa to la ma gtogs pa /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-14: sman tsha ba rnams kyi nang na bca' sga dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:136b-17: gsum ma gtogs pa sman kha ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-18: tsha ba gzhan dag ni ro tsa ba 'bri zhing rlung skyed pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-19: lnga po de dag ni ro tsa bar byed ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-21: bska las aa ru ra ma gtogs //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-22: phal cher bsil zhing sri bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-24: sman bska ba shi ri sha la sogs pa thams cad las phal cher te /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-25: mang du bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-26: bshang ba la sogs pa sri bar byed ba yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-27: aa ru ra ma gtogs te /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-28: de ni nus pa dro zhing 'khru bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-29: ro tsha skyur dang lan tshva rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-30: go rims bzhin du dro nus ldan //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-34: lan tshva rnams ni go rims bzhin te /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-35: rim pa ma 'chol bar tsha ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-36: de yang tsha ba ni tsha zhing dro ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-37: skyur ba ni rab tu tsha ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-38: lan tshva ni mchog tu dro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-39: kha dang bska dang mngar ba rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-40: de bzhin du ni bsil ba nyid //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-42: ro kha ba dang bska ba dang mngar ba rnams ni de bzhin du zhes pa /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-43: go rims snga ma bzhin du bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin gyi kha ba ni bsil ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-44: bska ba ni rab tu bsil ba yin /
T13TD4312.1E:136b-45: mngar ba ni mchog tu bsil ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-46: kha dang tsha dang bska ba rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:136b-47: de bzhin rtsub cing dri ma sri //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-0: bska ba rnams ni de bzhin du zhes pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rtsub cing dri ma @137a * //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-1: sri bar byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-2: kha ba ni rtsub pa dang dri ma sri bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-3: tsha ba ni rab tu rtsub cing rab tu dri ma sri ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-4: bska ba ni shin tu rtsub cing dri ma sri ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-5: lan tshva skyur mngar snum ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-6: bshang gci thur gyi dbugs 'byin byed //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-10: mngar ba rnams ni snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-11: bshang gci dang thur gyi dbugs 'byin cing 'don par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-12: go rims bzhin zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-13: lan tshva ni snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-14: bshang gci dang phyi rol gyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-15: skyur ba ni rab tu snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-16: bshang ba dang gci ba dang phyi rol gyi dbugs rab tu 'byin par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-17: mngar ba ni shin tu snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-18: bshang ba dang gci ba dang phyi rol gyi dbugs shin tu 'byin bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-19: lan tshva las bska de bas kyang //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-20: mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-22: ro lan tshva las ni ro bska ba lci ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-23: de bas kyang zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-24: ro bska ba bas kyang ro mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-25: skyur las tsha dang de bas kyang //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-26: kha ba dag ni yang ba yin ;
T13TD4312.1E:137a-28: ro skyur ba ni yang ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-29: de bas kyang tsha ba yang ba yin zhing ro tsha ba de las kyang kha ba dag yang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-30: ro rnams kyi dbye ba bshad pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-31: ro rnams kyis ni dbye ba las //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-32: sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-33: brtag pa drug cu rtsa gsum du ;
T13TD4312.1E:137a-34: / rags rim ji bzhin phye ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-36: ro rnams kyi gzhi bo sman gyi sbyor ba byas pa las 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul du phan tshun 'dres pa'i sbyor ba byas shing rnam par phye ba las sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun tha dad par bya ba yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-37: yang 'di rnams la brtag pa drug cu rtsa gsum du phye ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137a-38: ji ltar byas nas ro rnams kyi sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-39: brtag pa drug cu byas pa yin zhe na /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-40: rags rim ji bzhin zhes bya ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-41: rags pa'i go rims la ltos shing mtshon nas /
T13TD4312.1E:137a-42: ro gsal bar myang ba'i tshul dang //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-0: @137b rjes su mthun par byas pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-1: ro phra mo yan chad rab dang mchog gi dbye ba las ni ro mtha' yas pa yin pas /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-2: phra mo rnams kyi dbang du byas ba ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-3: de yang ji tsam zhig lus las dgos pa yod pa de tsam gyi rags rim ji lta ba bzhin du phye zhing grangs su chad par byas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-4: sbyor ba nyid ro gnyis la sogs pa'i dbye bas bshad pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-5: de lnga re re phri ba las //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-6: lngar gyur ba ni ro gnyis pa //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-8: ro gnyis sbyar ba ni gnyis pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-9: ro'i gzhi sman dang 'brel pa'i sbyor ba gnyis pa de la ro lnga po de dag gi sbyor ba byas pa las 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-11: re re phri ba las gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-12: mngar ba phri ba'i skyur ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-13: skyur ba phri ba'i lan tshva la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-14: kha ba phri ba'i tsha ba dang bska ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-15: tsha ba phri ba'i bska ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-16: de ltar na mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro re re phul ba'i ro lnga ni sbyor ba'i don du 'gro bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-17: skyur ba la sogs pa ni sbyor bar byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-19: mngar ba dang skyur bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-20: mngar ba dang lan tshva sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-21: mngar ba dang kha ba sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-22: mngar ba dang tsha ba sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-23: mngar ba dang bska ba sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-24: de ltar na mngar ba dbye ba rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-25: skyur ba'i gnyis pa ni mngar ba la ltos nas re re phri bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-26: dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-27: lan tshva dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-28: lan tshva dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-29: lan tshva dang bska bar sbyar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-30: de ltar na lan tshva'i gsum par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-31: kha ba'i gnyis pa ni lan tshva la ltos nas /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-32: re re phri bar gyur na dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-33: kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-34: kha ba dang bska bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-35: tsha ba dang kha ba la ltos nas gcig phri bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-36: dbye ba rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:137b-37: tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-38: de ltar na gnyis pa de dag dbye ba rnam pa bco lngar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:137b-39: gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste //
T13TD4312.1E:138a-0: lan tshva gsum ste kha ba gcig / bzhi pa la ni mngar po @138a * //
T13TD4312.1E:138a-2: / skyur pa bzhi po lan tshva gcig / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-3: gsum pa mngar bcu zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-4: sman gyi ro gsum pa la /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-5: ro mngar ba dbye ba rnam pa bcur 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-6: de yang 'di ltar mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-9: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-10: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-11: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-12: mngar ba dang lan tshva dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-13: mngar ba dang lan tshva dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-14: mngar ba dang lan tshva dang bska bar sbyar ba dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:138a-15: / mngar ba dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-16: mngar ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-17: mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-19: skyur drug ste zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-20: ro skyur ba gsum pa'i dbye ba drug tu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-21: skyur ba dang lan tshva dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-22: skyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-23: skyur ba dang lan tshva dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-24: skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-25: skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-26: skyur ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-28: lan tshva gsum zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-29: lan tshva'i gsum pa ni dbye ba rnam pa gsum du gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-30: lan tshva dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-31: lan tshva dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-32: lan tshva dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-33: de ltar na dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138a-34: kha ba gcig pu nyid ces bya ba ni ro kha ba ni kha ba dang tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-36: dbye ba gcig pu nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138a-37: de ltar na gsum pa nyi shur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138a-38: bzhi pa la ni mngar po bcu zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-39: bzhi pa la ni zhes bya ba dbye ba bzhi pa can la ro mngar ba dbye ba bcur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138a-41: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-42: lan tshva dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-43: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138a-44: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-0: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba @138b dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:138b-1: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang lan tshvar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-2: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-3: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-4: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-5: mngar ba dang lan tshva dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-6: mngar ba dang lan tshva dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-7: de ltar na dbye ba rnam par bcur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-8: skyur ba bzhi po zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-9: skyur ba bzhi po dbye ba bzhir 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-11: lan tshva dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-12: skyur ba dang lan tshva dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-13: skyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-14: skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste de ltar na dbye ba rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-15: lan tshva sna gcig ces bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-16: ro lan tshva'i bzhi pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-18: lan tshva dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-19: de ltar na dbye ba rnam pa bco lngar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-20: lnga pa la ni skyur gcig pu //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-21: mngar ba lnga la bsten pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-23: dbye ba rnam pa lnga ni /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-24: ro skyur ba'i dbye ba gcig pu bsten pa ni 'di lta ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-28: tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-29: lnga pa la ro mngar ba ni dbye ba lnga bsten cing gnas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-30: 'di ltar mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-31: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:138b-32: mngar ba dang lan tshva dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-33: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-34: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-35: de ltar rnam pa lnga dang /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-36: snga ma dang bcas pa lnga pa dbye ba drug tu 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-37: sman ni ro drug gcig pu yin //
T13TD4312.1E:138b-39: sman ni ro drug ces bya ba gcig bur 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:138b-40: mngar ba dang skyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-0: spyir gcig bu kho nar 'dus shing gcig tu 'gyur @139a * //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-2: de ltar na sbyor ba ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-5: ma 'dres pa ni gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang 'brel te /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-6: gcig pu nyid du ni ro drug tu 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-13: de rnams bye brag gi chogs nye bar sbyar ba yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-14: bye brag de ni snum gyi cho ga la drug cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-15: de yang ro dbye ba de gnyis gcig pu gnyis /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-16: drug cu rtsa gsum dag tu brtag / snum gyis gzhan dag zil mnan cing //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-17: nyung ba nyid kyi rim las bshad //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-19: dbye ba de dag bye brag dran par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad par bsdus te smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-20: lnga pa drug dang ro ni tha dad drug / bzhi pa gnyis pa rnam pa bco lnga yin //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-21: dbye ba gsum pa nyi shu gcig nyid de //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-22: sman ni ro drug de ltar drug cu gsum //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-24: ro lnga'i sbyor ba du yod ce na /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-26: lnga pa la ni skyur gcig pu //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-27: mngar ba lnga ni bstan pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-29: de ltar lnga pa la ni sbyor ba'i dbye ba drug yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-30: ro tha dad drug ces bya ba ni ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las ni mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-35: ro drug gi dbye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-36: bzhi pa gnyis pa rnam pa bco lnga yin //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-38: bzhi pa dang gnyis pa'i dbye ba ni rnam pa bco lnga ste /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-39: de ltar na bzhi ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-40: gnyis pa'i rnam ba phye ba'i ro ni dbye ba rnam ba sum cur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-42: bzhi pa la ni mngar bo bcu //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-43: skyur ba bzhi bo lan tsha gcig / ces smos pa'i phyir bco lnga yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-44: dbye ba gsum pa nyi shu zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-45: dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis phye ba'i ro rnams ni /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-46: dbye ba ni rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:139a-47: gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-48: lan tshva gsum ste kha ba gcig / ces bya ba yin pas na nyi shu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:139a-50: sman ni ro drug ces bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-0: sman ni @139b ro drug gcig pu yin //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-2: de ltar drug cu rtsa gsum zhes bya ba ni ro rnams kyi dbye ba drug cu rtsa gsum yod ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-3: de dag kyang gong du grangs lnga bcu rtsa bdun du chad pa'i bcos mar yongs su dbye ba'i sbyor ba dang bcas par bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-4: ma bcos pa'i ro drug ste /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-5: ro drug cur ro rnams dbye bar bshad ba gang yin pa de ni dgos pa'i dbang du byas pa las /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-6: mtshon cing lus la dgos pa'i yul du rigs pa nyid las /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-7: rags rim ji lta ba bzhin du phye zhing bshad pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-8: phra ba rnams kyi sbyor ba brtsis pa'i tshul 'di tsam du zad pa yang ma yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-9: dbye ba yang drug cu rtsa gsum du zad pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-10: gang gi phyir phra zhing rab tu phra bar brtag pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-11: de bzhin du rab dang mchog tu brtag pa'i dbang dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-12: de bzhin ro dang ro rjes kyi dgos pa'i dbang las ni /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-13: 'di rnams kyi dbye ba grangs med pa yin pas na /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-14: 'di dag bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-15: de rnams ro dang ro rjes ro'i dbye ba //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-16: rab dang rab mchog dag tu brags pa las //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-17: rtsis las 'das par byung bar gyur ba ni //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-18: nad dang sman gyi dbang las nye bar sbyar //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-20: drug cu rtsa gsum gyi grangs kyi dbye bas phye ba de rnams ni rtsis las 'das pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-21: shin tu mang ba'i phyir brtsi bar mi nus bar 'gyur zhing skyes par gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-23: ro dang rjes kyi dbye ba las te /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-25: byung bas sman rnams ro gcig min //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-26: zhes bya ba smos pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-27: ro dang rjes de gnyis kyang 'di ltar mngar ba'i rjes ni skyur ba la sogs pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-28: skyur ba'i rjes ni mngar ba la sogs pa yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-29: de bzhin du skyur ba ni lan tshva'i la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:139b-30: lan tshva ni kha ba la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-31: de rnams zhes bya ba'i tshig gis thams cad la snyegs su zin kyang /
T13TD4312.1E:139b-32: lnga bcu rtsa bdun bo nyid la ci rigs par ro dang ro rjes kyi dbye ba byas na grangs med par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-0: ro drug po 'ba' zhig la rab dang rab mchog la sogs pa'i brtag @140a * //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-1: pa las grangs med bar 'gyur ba lta su zhig 'gog / de gnyis kyis na rab dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-2: rab mchog dag tu brtag pa las zhes smos pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-4: ma sbyar ba'i dbye ba mchog dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-5: rab mchog dag tu brtag pa ni 'di ltar mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-7: rab mchog tu mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-9: cung zad rab tu mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-10: cung zad rab mchog tu mngar ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-11: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-12: yang ro'i dbye ba de rnams nad kyi sman gyi dbang gis nye bar sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-13: de la nad ni rlung la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-14: sman ni aa ru ra la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-15: nad dang sman gyi mngar ba ni de'i ched dam /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-18: de'i dbang du byas pa las yongs su brtags te sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-19: bab bab tu 'chol bar bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-20: nad dang sman zhes smos pa ni nye bar mtshon ba tsam yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-21: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-22: slob dbon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-23: le'u bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o ;
T13TD4312.1E:140a-25: // / de nas nad la sogs pa'i tshul shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-26: de'i rjes thogs la nad la sogs pa shes par bya ba brtsam par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-27: gang gi phyir ro rnams kyis dbye ba drug cu rtsa gsum gyis phye ba de dag kyang nad kyi sman gyi dbang du sbyar bar bya ba yin par bshad la /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-28: de lta bas na nad las rjes su dpags te sbyar bar bya'i /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-29: bab bab tu 'chol bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-30: de bas na nad de rnams ni rang gi las kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba nyid las rjes su dpags te shes par bya dgos te /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-31: de shes par bya ba'i phyir na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:140a-32: 'dir nad rnams gzhi med par ni ji ltar yang shes par mi nus la /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-33: de bas na nad de rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa /
T13TD4312.1E:140a-34: lus zungs dang dri ma rnams gang yin pa de shes par bya dgos pas na /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-0: nad shes par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma @140b zad kyi zhes bya bar nges par gnas so //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-1: de ltar na nad la sogs pa shes par bya ba de la phan pa'i le'u bshad par bya zhing bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-2: nad dang lus zungs dri ma rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-3: rtag tu lus kyi rtsa ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-5: nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams ni /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-6: nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams te /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-7: de ni rtag par dus thams cad du lus kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-8: lus ni de las byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-9: rtsa ba dang 'dra bas na rtsa ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-10: rgyu'i gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-11: de rlung dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dang //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-12: bskyod dang las spyod shugs 'byin dang //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-13: lus zungs legs par rgyu ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-14: dbang po rnams ni gsal ba dag / mi gnod pa ni rjes 'dzin yin //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-16: lus de ni rlung mi gnod cing /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-17: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pas mnyam par gnas na lus rjes su 'dzin cing rten par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-18: de la dbugs 'byung ba ni gyen du dbugs 'byin cing gtong ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-19: dbugs rngub ba ni dbugs sdud cing thur du 'jug pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-20: bskyod pa ni dbugs su bya ba thams cad la brtson zhing rtsol ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-21: las la spyod pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las la spyod cing 'jug pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-22: shugs 'byin pa ni bshang ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-23: gci ba dang rlung phyi rol tu 'byin pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-24: lus zungs legs par rgyu ba zhes pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-25: lus zungs kyi sgras ni dangs ma la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-26: mkhris pa dang bad kan dag gzung ngo //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-27: de rnams legs par rgyu ba ni mnyam par gnas shing 'jug pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-28: de la mnyam par rgyu ba'i gnas skabs nyid kyis de rnams rlung nyid mi gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-29: gang gi phyir rnam par 'thor zhing 'khrugs pa sdud cing bzhi bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-30: de bzhin du dbang po rnams gsal ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-31: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po yul 'dzin pa la gsal bar gnas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-32: yon tan de dag dang ldan na mi gnod cing rjes su 'dzin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:140b-33: mkhris pa 'ju drod mthong byed dang /
T13TD4312.1E:140b-34: bkres skom zas len mdangs yid gzhungs //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-0: @141a * // blo ldan dpa' snying lus 'jam pas //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-2: de mkhris par 'gyur ba med cing 'ju ba la sogs pas rjes su 'dzin cing rten par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-3: de la 'ju ba ni zas smin cing 'ju ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-5: mthong ba ni gzugs 'dzin par nus pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-8: zas len pa ni yi ga 'byed cing nye bar longs spyod par 'dod pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-9: mdangs ni bzhin mdog gsal zhing gzi mdangs che ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-10: yid gzhungs pa ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-11: blo dang ldan pa ni blo gros dang ldan pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-12: dpa' snying ni sems kyis rtul phod pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:141a-14: lus 'jam ba ni lus kyi sha mdangs 'jam zhing mnyen pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:141a-15: de dag gis lus kyi rten byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-16: bad kan brtan zhing snum nyid dang //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-17: tshigs 'brel bzod la sogs pas so //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-19: de la bad kan ni mi 'gyur zhing brtan pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T13TD4312.1E:141a-20: lus rjes su 'dzin par byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-21: brtan pa ni mi g-yo ba nyid do //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-22: snum pa nyid ni lus snum par gyur pa nyid do //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-23: tshigs 'brel pa ni lhu tshigs kyi bar de rnam par 'brel zhing dam du gnas pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-24: bzod pa ni gnod pa la mi 'khrugs pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:141a-25: de dag la sogs pas phan pa'i las byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-26: lus zungs las gtso go rims bzhin //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-27: tshim byed 'tsho byed g-yogs pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-28: snum dang brtan dang 'gengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-29: mngal ni skyed byed yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-31: bcud kyi dangs ma la sogs pa /
T13TD4312.1E:141a-32: lus zungs bdun po rnams kyi mchog dang /
T13TD4312.1E:141a-33: gtso bo bdun ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa la sogs pa yin par slob dpon dag gis bshad cing bstan to //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-34: de la tshim par byed pa ni lus zungs tshim zhing sems dga' bar byed pa ni dangs ma'i bcud kyi las kyi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-35: 'tsho bar byed cing srog 'dzin par byed pa ni khrag gi las so //
T13TD4312.1E:141a-36: lus kyi rus pa g-yogs shing khebs par byed pa ni sha'i las so //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-0: lus snum zhing bcud can du byed pa ni tshil gyi @141b las so //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-1: lus brtan zhing mkhrang por bsgreng ba ni rus pa'i las yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-2: gzhan du na lus la rus pa med na sha'i grong bu nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-3: rus pa'i rkang sbubs 'gengs pa ni rkang gi las so //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-4: mngal skyed cing 'byung bar byed pa ni khu ba'i las kyi mchog yin par bshad do ;
T13TD4312.1E:141b-5: / brtan par byed pa bshang ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-7: ba spu brtan pa rdul gyi yin //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-9: lus brtan cing 'byin par byed pa ni //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-10: bshang pa'i las kyi gtso bo yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-12: phyi rol du 'byin zhing 'don pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-13: gcin gyi las kyi gtso bo yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-14: skra dang ba spu brtan par 'dzin par byed pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-15: rdul gyi las kyi gtso bo yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-16: rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-17: skem dang mdog gnag drod bag dga' //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-18: 'dar dang lto sbos bshang ba sri //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-19: stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-20: smra mang mgo 'khor zhum par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-22: rlung gi nad 'phel zhing skyes par gyur pas skem pa la sogs bskyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-23: de la skem pa ni khrag la sogs pa zad pas skem zhing nyam chung ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-24: mdog nag pa ni kha dog nyams pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-25: drod bag la dga' ba ni dro ba mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-27: lto sbos pa ni gsud pa rgyas pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-28: bshang ba sri ba ni bshang gci 'gags pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-29: stobs la sogs pa nyams pa ni de dag dang bral ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-30: smra mang ba ni ma 'brel bar mang du smra ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-31: mgo 'khor ba ni lus mal na mi gnas shing 'khor ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-32: zhum pa ni sems mi dga' zhing gdung bar byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-33: mkhris pa bshang gci pags mig ser //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-34: bkres skom lus tsha gnyid chung byed //
T13TD4312.1E:141b-36: mkhris pa 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-37: bshang ba la sogs pa ser por byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-38: bshang ba dang gci ba srib dang /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-40: mig gi mdog kha dog ser por 'gyur bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:141b-41: de bzhin du bkres pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142a-0: lus tsha ba dang gnyid chung ba nyid du byed par @142a * //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-2: bad kan drod nyams mchil ma mang //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-3: khong snyom lci dang sha mdog dkar //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-4: lus grang yan lag lhod pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-5: lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid che //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-6: dangs ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-8: bad kan 'phel bas me drod nyams pa la sogs pa byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-9: de la drod nyams pa ni pho ba'i me drod nyams pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-10: mchil ma mang ba ni mchil ma lhag par 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-11: khong snyom pa ni spro ba chung zhing sgyid lug pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-12: lci ba ni lus kyi yan lag lci ba nyid do //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-13: sha mdog dkar ba ni lus kyi mdog dkar zhing skya ba nyid do //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-14: de bzhin du lus grang ba nas gnyid che ba'i bar yang skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-15: dangs ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-17: bcud kyi dangs ma 'phel bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:142a-18: drod nyams pa nas gnyid che ba'i bar bad kan dang 'dra bar skyed par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-20: mdze dang rlung khrag mkhris pa khrag / skran dang rnyil nad mig ser dang //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-21: bskyod dka' drod nyams rmongs bag dang //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-22: mig dang gcin pags dmar bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-24: khrag 'phel ba las ni me dbal la sogs nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-25: rlung khrag ni rlung dang khrag 'dres pa las gyur pa'i nad do //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-26: mkhris pa dang khrag ni mkhris pa dang khrag 'dres pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-27: rnyil nad ni so'i sha las khrag las gyur pa'i sha lhag skye ba'am skrang ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-28: bskyod dka' ba ni rkang lag lci ba la bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-29: yang na byang gya zhes pa gdong la dmar po tal til byung ba'i pags nad la bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-30: gzhan dag ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-31: sha 'phel wa ba rmen bum dud //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-32: mkhur tshos brang lto brla sbom zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-33: mgul sogs lhag par sha yang che //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-35: sha 'phel ba las ni wa [?] bal sogs pa skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:142a-36: de bzhin du mkhur tshos dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142a-39: brla sbom pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142a-40: mgul pa la sogs par lhag par sha che bar 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:142a-41: sha'i steng du sha skyes pa lta bur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-1: cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs rgod cing //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-4: tshil 'phel ba ni sha 'phel ba de dang 'dra bar wa ba la sogs pa skyed bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-5: de bzhin du ngal ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-6: cung zad bskyod cing g-yo ba dag la yang dbugs rgod par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-7: rkub tshos dang nu ma dang gsus pa dag kyang sbom zhing rgyas pa nyid kyis 'phyang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-10: rus pa 'phel bas ni rus pa'i steng du rus pa skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-11: de bzhin du so'i steng du so 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-12: rkang 'phel lus lci mig rtsa g-yung //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-13: tshigs kyi mgo bo sbom pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-14: tshigs la thor bu gso dka' 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-16: rkang 'phel nas ni lus lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-17: mig rtsa g-yung zhing zhan par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-18: tshigs mdud kyi mgo bo rnams sbom zhing che bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-19: tshigs la thor bu g-yo zhing mi bzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-20: khu 'phel bud med la rab gdu //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-23: khu ba 'phel zhing rgyas pa ni bud med la rab tu gdu zhing chags pa che bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-24: khu ba las byung ba'i rde'u dag chags par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-26: lus lci lto ba na bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-29: lto ba ste khong sbos shing gang ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-30: rgyu ma 'khrug cing krug krug zer ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-31: lus lci zhing bskyod dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-32: lto ba na zhing zug gzer skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-33: gcin 'phel chu sor zug cing na //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-34: gcis kyang ma gcis snyam sems 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:142b-36: gcin 'phel bar gyur pa ni chu sor zug cing lhag par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-37: de bzhin du gcis shing btang du zin kyang ma gcis pa snyam sems par 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-38: yongs su 'dor ba snyam sems par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:142b-39: yang dang yang 'ong bas na gcis so snyam du sems par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-2: / g-yan pa nyid kyang skyed ces bya //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-4: rdul chen nang du 'phel bas rdul rab tu che bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-5: lus dri mi zhim pa nyid du byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-6: g-yan pa nyid kyang skyed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-7: mig rdul la sogs dri ma rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-8: mang bas lci la sogs par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-10: mig rdul ni mig gi dri ma'o //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-11: sogs pa'i sgras ni rna ba la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams kyang bsdu bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-12: de ltar na mig rdul la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams mang zhing 'phel bas lci zhing mang du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-13: de bzhin du sogs pa zhes smos pas g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-14: 'drul ba la sogs par byed pa bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-15: de dag kyang zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-16: rlung zad mtshan ma lus mi bde //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-17: smra nyung rtsol ba chung bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-18: dran pa mi gsal bad kan 'phel //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-19: sngar bshad pa yi nad rnams 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-21: rlung zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni lus mi bde zhing sgyid snyom pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-22: smra ba nyung zhing gcom chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-23: rtsol zhing lus kyi las su byed pa dag kyang chung zhing zhan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-24: dran pa mi gsal ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-25: rig cing tshor ba chung ba dang de bzhin du bad kan 'phel bar gyur pa'i skabs su sngar bshad pa'i nad drod nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-26: mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-27: mkhris zad drod nyams grang ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-30: mkhris pa zad pa'i mtshan ma ni me'i drod nyams shing rtul ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-31: lus grang zhing bsil bag tu 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-32: mdog mdangs nyams par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-34: mgo 'khor bad kan gnas stongs shing //
T13TD4312.1E:143a-37: bad kan zad pa'i mtshan ma ni mgo 'khor ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-38: lus dang sems mal la mi gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-39: bad kan gyi gnas sna la sogs pa stongs shing bskams pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143a-40: snying 'dar zhing g-yo la 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-0: tshigs kyi tshogs rnams @143b lhod cing shig shig por 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-1: cung zad rtsub ngal skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-2: na zhing sgra cher mi bzod 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-4: bcud dam dangs ma zad pa'i mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-6: nga la zhing dub pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-8: na zhing nyam chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-9: sgra cher grags pa mi bzod cing /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-10: tshig smras brnag dka' bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-11: khrag zad skyur dang bsil la dga' //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-12: rtsa lhod pags pa rtsub par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-14: khrag zad pa'i mtshan ma ni ro skyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-15: reg pa bsil ba la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:143b-16: rtsa lhod cing rnying ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-17: lus kyi pags pa rtsub par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-18: sha zad dbang nyams mig mkhur ba'i //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-19: rus skams lhu tshigs na bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-21: sha zad pa'i mtshan ma ni dbang po nyams shing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-22: mig dang mkhur ba'i rus pa skams shing sha zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-23: lhu tshigs rnams na zhing bcag pa snyam sems par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-24: tshil zad gnyid che dpyi rked mngon //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-25: mcher ba che dang lus skems 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-27: tshil zad pa'i mtshan ma ni dpyi dang rked pa mngon zhing tshor ba chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-28: mcher pa che zhing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-29: lus skems shing rid par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-30: rus zad rus zug so dang ni //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-31: sen mo skra la sogs pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-33: rus pa zad pa'i mtshan ma ni rus pa nyid zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-34: de bzhin du so dang sen mo dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:143b-35: skra la sogs pa 'byung zhing 'byi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-36: rkang zad rkang sbubs stong pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-39: rkang zad pa'i mtshan ma ni rkang gi rus pa'i sbubs khong stong du 'dug pa dang de bzhin du mgo 'khor ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:143b-40: rab rib can du 'gyur zhing mun par 'thoms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-42: yang na khu ba khrag nyid 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-43: rlig pa shin tu na ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-44: pho mtshan tshig pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.1E:143b-46: khu bzad pa'i mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-2: yang na khu ba khrag nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-3: rlig pa de 'bras bu sbubs can shin tu na zhing 'jug pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-4: pho mtshan tshig cing du ba 'thul ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-5: bshang zad rlung ni rgyu ma'i nang //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-6: sgra bcas 'khyil ba lta bur byed //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-7: lto bar rgyu zhing gyen du 'gro //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-8: snying ga rtsib logs mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-10: bshang ba zad pa'i mtshan ma ni rlung rgyu ma'i nang na rgyu ba sgra dang bcas shing 'khyil ba lta bur yan man du rgyu ba dang de bzhin du lto bar gyen du rgyu zhing 'gro bas na bar byed pa ;
T13TD4312.1E:144a-11: snying ga dang rtsib logs gnyis su mi bzad par na zhing gzer bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-12: gcin zad gcin ni nyung sri dang //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-15: gcin zad pa'i mtshan ma ni gcin zad cing cung zad 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-16: sri zhing na bar 'byung ba dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:144a-18: khrag dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-22: rdul zad pa'i mtshan ma ni spu 'byi zhing lhung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-23: ba spu'i bu ga 'dzums shing 'grengs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-24: pags pa rnams 'gas shing 'gyes par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-25: dri ma shin tu phra ba rnams //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-26: zad pas brtag dka' dri ma yi //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-27: rang gnas bskams dang na ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-28: stong dang yang ba las shes bya //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-30: mig rdul la sogs pa'i dri ma shin tu phra ba rnams zad pa'i mtshan ma ni brtag par dka' ste /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-31: de bas na dri ma rnams kyi rang gi gnas skabs la sogs pa las shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-32: dri ma rnams kyi rang gi gnas yin pas na dri ma'i rang gnas te /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-33: mig la sogs pa de rnams bskams pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-34: na ba dang stong pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-35: yang ba las zad pa brtag par dka' ba'i dri ma de rnams kyi zad pa shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:144a-36: de ltar nad dang lus zungs dang /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-37: dri ma rnams kyi zad pa dang 'phel ba rgya cher bshad nas /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-38: mdor bsdus nas smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:144a-39: nad sogs rang nyid ji lta ba'i //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-0: yon tan 'di ni bzlog pa dag / zad @144b pa dang ni 'phel 'gyur las //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-3: ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-4: rang nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba'i go bzlog pa zad pa las ni 'phel bar shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-5: rang nyid kyi yon tan go bzlog pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba las ni 'bri bar shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-6: nad la sogs pa'i nam mtshan nyid las go bzlog par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-7: de ji ltar rlung gi nad kyi yon tan las go bzlog pa ni snum pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-8: mkhris pa'i ni bsil ba la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-9: bad kan gyi ni rtsub pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-10: de rnams las go bzlog pa zad cing ;
T13TD4312.1E:144b-11: bri ba las ni nad 'phel bar shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-12: de rnams kyi las kyang go bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid 'phel zhing lhag par gyur ba las ni /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-13: 'bri zhing zad par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-14: dri ma thogs las 'phel ba ste //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-15: shin tu 'byung las zad shes bya //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-17: bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams thogs shing 'byung bar mi byed pa las ni 'phel bar shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-18: shin tu 'byung zhing lhag par phyir 'byung ba las ni zad par shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-19: sngar bshad ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-22: zad pa gnyi ga yang nad skyed par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-23: de la yang gang zhig zad par 'gyur ba de 'phel ba bas ches lhag par 'phel te gnod pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-25: lus ni dri mas brten pas na //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-26: 'phel bas zad pa gnod pa yin ;
T13TD4312.1E:144b-28: lus te phung po 'di ni dri mas brten cing grogs su byas pa yin pas dri ma rnams 'phel zhing lhag par gyur pas zad cing 'grib par gyur pas ches lhag par gnod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-29: nad la sogs pa'i dngos po de rnams las gang zhig gzhi gang la brten zhe na /
T13TD4312.1E:144b-31: de la rlung ni rus par gnas //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-32: mkhris pa rdul dang khrag la gnas //
T13TD4312.1E:144b-35: de la rlung la sogs pa de rnams kyi nang nas rlung ni rus pa la brten zhing gnas la /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-0: mkhris pa ni rdul dang khrag la gnas @145a * //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-2: / bad kan ni lhag ma la gnas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-5: khrag ni gnas pa po dang ldan pas /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-6: de ma gtogs pa lhag ma dangs ma dang /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-11: bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa gzhan dag la gnas te /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-12: de dag la gnas pa po med pas lhag ma zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-13: dangs ma la sogs pa lhag ma de rnams la bad kan brten zhing gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-15: phan tshun rten dang brten pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-16: 'phel dang zad par byed pa'i sman //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-17: gcig gi gang yin gzhan gyi'ang de //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-19: gang tshul de lta bu des na nad dri ma rnams gnas dang gnas pa po 'phel bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-20: gang brten cing zad par byed pa na brten pa po'i yang zad par byed pa yin pas na gcig gi sman gang yin pa gzhan gyi yang de nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-21: de lta na ni gang rlung gi gnas rus pa 'phel ba'i sman des ni /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-22: dang po rlung yang 'phel bar byed la /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-23: rus pa zad par byed pa'i sman des ni rlung yang zad par byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-24: rus pa rlung gnyis la 'di min //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-26: rus pa dang rlung gnyis ma 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-27: zad par byed pa'i sman 'di ltar mi sbyor ro zhes shugs kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-29: bad kan rjes mthun de yi phyir //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-30: de las bzlog pas zad pa yin /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-33: gang gi phyir nad dang lus zungs 'di rnams ni phal cher brtas par byas shing tshim par byas pas 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-34: 'phel ba de yang bad kan dang rjes su mthun pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-35: phal cher zhes smos pa ni gzhan dag tu ni kha cig 'di ltar ma yin pa yang yod do zhes ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145a-36: de ltar brtan pa las 'phel bar 'gyur pa'i rgyu de'i phyir brten pa po'i tshul can dang nad dang lus zungs 'di dag zad par bya ba ni de las bzlog pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:145a-37: nyams smad pa ming gi rnam grangs su smyung bar bya ba zhes bya bas zad par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-0: gang yang rus pa 'phel bar byed pa'i sman snum pa dang mngar ba la sogs pa de ni rlung zad par byed @145b pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-1: gang rlung 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i sman rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-2: kha ba la sogs pa de ni nyams smad par byed pa /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-3: smyung ba'i rjes su mthun pas ni rus bzad par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-4: de bas na rus pa rlung gnyis la 'di yin zhes smos te /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-5: bstan bcos byed pas phal mo che'i dbang du mdzad nas smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-7: smyung dang brta bar bya ba yis //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-8: nad ni rim gyis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-11: gang gi phyir de ltar blta ba'i tshul las ni 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-12: nyams smad pa'i tshul las ni zad par 'gyur ba des na nad kyi 'phel ba dang zad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i smyung ba dang brta bar bya ba dag gis nad kyi rnam pa rim gyis gso bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-13: de yang 'phel ba las gyur pa'i nad la smyung ba dang nyams smad pas gso bar bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-14: zad pa las gyur pa'i nad la ni brta zhing tshim par bya bas /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-16: de lta na ni rlung gso bar bya ba dag la rlung 'phel ba las gyur pa'i nad la ni smyung bar bya bas gso dgos la /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-17: rlung zad pa las byung ba'i nad la brta bar bya dgos par 'gyur ro zhes rtogs par gyur pas /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-19: rlung ma gtogs te zhes bya ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-20: gso ba'i rim pa de la rlung ni ma gtogs te /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-21: 'di las gzhan du bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-23: de nyid bzlog thabs sbyar bar bya /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-25: rlung de las skyes pa'i nad rnams la ni de nyid ces bya ba smyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-26: brta bar bya ba dag gi bzlog pa'i thabs kyis gso bar bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-27: 'phel ba ni brta bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-28: zad pa la ni smyung bar bya bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-29: khyad par du ni brag skyes nad //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-30: gtar ga bkru sman dag gis so //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-32: nad kyi gso ba la yang khyad par du bya ba ni khrag skyes shing 'phel ba las nad du gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-33: gtar ga bya zhing khrag dbyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:145b-34: bkru sman btang bdag gis gso zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-35: sha cher skyes las byung ba'i nad //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-36: gtar ga me btsa' thal sman sbyar //
T13TD4312.1E:145b-38: sha cher skyes shing sbom pa las byung ba'i nad la ni gtar ga bya ba dang me btsa' gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-0: thal sman rnon po sbyar ba la sogs pas @146a * //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-2: tshil ches sbom skems gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-4: tshil ches shing 'phel ba las byung ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-5: sbom pa gso ba'i cho ga rnam pa gnyis bshad pa'i tshul gyis gso bar bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-6: tshil zad pa las byung ba'i nad la ni skem po gso ba'i cho ga rnam pa gnyis kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-7: rus pa zad pa las byung la //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-8: mar dang 'o ma kha rar sbyar //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-9: de bzhin 'jam rtsi gtang bas gso //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-11: rus pa zad pa las byung ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-12: sman ro kha ba dang sbyar ba'i 'o ma la sogs pas gso ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-13: de bzhin du 'jam rtsi mas gtong bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-16: bshang ba 'phel ba las byung ba'i nad la ni drag tu 'khru ba'i cho gas gso'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-17: bshang ba zad las byung ba'i nad //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-18: ra lug nang khrol zan dron dang //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-19: sbyar thug ma sha gnyis sogs sbyin //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-21: bshang ba zad pa las byung ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-22: ra dang lug gi nang khrol rgyu ma la sogs pa g-yos su byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-25: ma sha gnyis po ste mon sran sde'u dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-26: mon sran dkar po gnyis sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-27: sogs pa'i sgras rgya sne'u'i tshod ma dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:146a-29: rtsab mo rang skyur la sogs pa sbyin pa bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-31: gcin zad las byung gcin snyi gso //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-33: gcin mang ba las byung ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-34: gcin 'bri ba'i gso ba'i cho gas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-35: gcin zad pa las byung ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-36: gcin snyi ba gso ba'i cho gas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-37: rngul mi 'byung la rtsol dang bsku //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-38: rngul 'byung cho gas gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-40: rngul zad pa las byung ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-41: rtsol ba la sogs pas rngul dbyung ba'i cho gas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-42: lus kyi me drod rang gnas 'dug / cha shas lus zungs rnams la brten //
T13TD4312.1E:146a-46: lus kyi me drod ces bya ba /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-47: pho ba'i me drod yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:146a-48: rang gnas su 'dug ces bya ba /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-0: rang gi gnas zhu ba'i @146b gnas kyi bar na 'dug pa de'i cha shas gang yin pa rnams lus zungs la brten cing gnas pa'i cha de rnams 'bri zhing nyams dmas pas dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-1: cha shas de rnams nyid rab tu 'bar zhing stobs che bar gyur bas ni lus zungs rnams zad par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-2: lus zungs dang po phyi ma ni //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-3: rgyas byed zad pa'ang de bzhin no //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-5: lus zungs kyi dang po dangs ma zhes bya ba rgyas par gyur na de'i phyi ma khrag ces bya ba'i lus zungs rgyas par byed la /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-6: lus zungs kyi dangs ma zad na phyi ma khrag kyang de bzhin du zad par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-10: dri ma rnams kyi gnas la gnod pa'i rim pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-11: nad 'byung ba'i rim pa smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-12: nyes 'khrugs pas ni lus zungs nyen //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-13: gnyi gas dri ma la gnod byed //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-14: 'og na gnyis te mgo bor bdun //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-15: bu ga dang ni rngul 'byung ba'i ;
T13TD4312.1E:146b-16: / dri ma'i gnas ni dri ma ste //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-17: rang rang gnas su nad skyed 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-19: nyes pa ni rlung la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-20: de rnams 'khrugs pa ni rang gi rgyu rnams kyis ldang zhing g-yos so //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-21: des na lus zungs bya ba dangs ma la sogs pa la nyen cing gnod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-22: nyes pa dang lus zungs de gnyis ka 'khrugs shing g-yos pas ni dri ma la gnod par byed la /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-23: gnod pa dang ldan pa ni dri ma des ni dri ma'i gnas la gnod pa skyed par 'gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-24: dri ma'i gnas de dag gang yin zhe na /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-26: 'og na gnyis te bshang ba'i lam dang gci ba'i lam mo //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-27: mgo bor ni dri ma'i gnas bdun te /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-28: mig gnyis dang rna ba'i bu ga gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-30: lkog ma'i bu ga gcig ste /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-31: bu ga ni bu ga'i khung bu rnams dang /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-32: de bzhin du rngul 'byung bar byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-33: lus thams cad du gtogs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga rnams te /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-34: de thams cad kyang dri ma'i gnas yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:146b-35: de rnams ni gnod pa can gyi dri mas gnod pa skyed do //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-36: de bas na lus zungs dang dri ma'i gnas de rnams su rang rang gi gnas pa de rnams su rang gi nad skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:146b-37: de yang lus zungs rnams la nyes bas gnod pa skyed la /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-1: gnas rnams su ni dri mas gnod pa bskyed nas rang rang ji lta ba'i nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-2: de ltar nyes pa dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams rang gi las nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis bshad nas /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-3: da ni nyes pa dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams kyi rtsa ba /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-4: lus 'di'i nyes pa dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams zad dam ma zad par gyur kyang srog dang bcas par zad par gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-5: de 'phel bas srog dang bcas pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i lus gnas pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo de smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-6: lus zungs khu ba'i mthar thug pa'i //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-7: nang nas gzi can mdangs mchog yin ;
T13TD4312.1E:147a-8: / snying la gnas kyang khyab pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-9: lus ni brtan par gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-11: gang zhig gnas na gnas gyur pa //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-12: gang la dngos rnams sna tshogs pa //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-13: lus la brten pa 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-15: lus zungs dangs ma nas khu ba'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi nang na gzi can mdangs ni mchog yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-16: shin tu snying por gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-17: de ni mdangs zhes bya bar slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-18: de bzhin du snying ga la gnas su zin kyang lus ma lus par khyab pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-19: de yang rnam pa gnyis su bshad de /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-20: thig le drug pa'i tshad dang khyab par byed de //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-21: de ni lus thams cad la khyab par byed cing thig le drug pa kha dog dkar po dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-23: cung zad ser por snang ba khyad par du snying la gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-24: de yang lus ni brtan par gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-25: de ni lus brtan par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-26: de bsrung zhing gnas par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-27: de lus gnas shing 'jog par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-28: gzhan yang gang zhig 'jig cing med par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-29: nges par gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-30: de bzhin du mdangs gang zhig gnas shing yod par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-31: skyes bu de gnas shing 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-32: de bzhin du mdangs gang las dngos po'i ngo bo rnams rnam pa du mar 'byung zhing snang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:147a-33: lus la sogs pa sna tshogs par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing brten pa de ni mdangs zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-35: 'byung ba kun gyi mdangs gang yin //
T13TD4312.1E:147a-36: gzi can de ni mchog tu bshad //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-0: de @147b ni zla ba'i rang bzhin dag / dmar zhing cung zhig ser dang bcas //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-1: dang po mngal gyi snying po gang //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-2: gang de mngal gyi dangs mar gnas //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-3: snying ni chags par gyur pa na //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-4: gang zhig sngon chad brten gyur cing //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-5: lus kyi dangs ma snum dag dang //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-6: srog ni gang la brten gyur la //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-8: gang gis lus can 'tsho byed la //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-9: snying la gnas kyang khyab gyur gang //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-10: de ni srog gi gnas mchog yin //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-12: mdangs ni sems 'khrugs bkres sems las //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-13: mya ngan ngal la sogs pas zad //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-15: mdangs de ni sems byung 'khrugs pa la sogs pas zad par 'gyur te sems 'khrugs pa ni khros pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-16: bkres pa ni shin tu mi bzad par brub tsha ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-17: sems las ni yul rnam pa du ma la dpyod pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-18: mya ngan ni sems kyi sdug bsngal lo //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-19: ngal ba ni lus nyon mongs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-20: sogs pa'i sgras ni 'jig pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-21: de zad sdangs shing lus rid la //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-22: yang yang sems shing dbang po nyams //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-23: gzi nyams rtsub dang yid mi dga' //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-24: nyam chung bar ni 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-26: mdangs de zad cing nyams par gyur na mi sdangs pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-27: glo bur du skrag pa dang bcas par 'gyur ;
T13TD4312.1E:147b-28: de bzhin du lus rid cing me stobs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-29: yang dang yang du sems shing dpyod pa la brtson par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-30: dbang po thams cad nyams shing sdug bsngal la /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-31: myo myo por nus pa chung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-32: gzi byin nyams shing skya bo 'od 'od por 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-33: rtsub pa ste pags pa la sogs pa snum med pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-34: yid mi dga' zhing sems kyi mdud pa'i shas che bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-35: nyam chung ba ste lus zungs rnams zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-37: sha khu la sogs de'i sman yin //
T13TD4312.1E:147b-39: mdangs zad pa de'i sman ni dzi ban ti dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-40: nye'u shing la sogs pa 'tsho byed kyi sman rnams dang /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-43: sogs pa'i sgras brtas par byed pa'i sman rgun 'brum la sogs pa'i sman mngar ba'i sde tshan las bstan pa rnams bsdus te /
T13TD4312.1E:147b-44: de dag kyang de'i sman yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-2: 'tsho byed kyi sman gyi sde tshan gyi nang du gtogs na /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-3: ci'i phyir logs shig tu smos she na /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-4: 'o ma ni der sman gyi mchog yin pas khyad par du smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-5: zad pa dang 'phel ba dag ni sman mdor bsdus te smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-6: zas gang mi 'dod gang zhig slong //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-8: spang dang sbyin par bya ba dag / de dang des 'phel zad par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-10: bza' bar bya ba'i zas gang skyes bu mi 'dod cing 'grangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-11: yang zas gang zhig slong zhing 'dod par byed pa de dang de la zas mi 'phrod pa dang zhe 'grangs pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-12: spang zhing mi bza' ba dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:148a-13: 'phrod pa dang yid la 'dod pa ni sbyin zhing bza' bar bya ba gang yin pa de dang de ni nad 'phel ba dang nad zad par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-14: de yang 'dod cing slong ba'i zas de mi 'phrod pa med par gyur na bza' bar bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-15: nyes pa phyin ci log pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-16: mthun pas sred pa skyed byed de //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-17: phal cher 'phel dang zad pa dag / mi mkhas pa yis mi shes so //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-19: gang gi phyir rlung la sogs pa'i nyes pa dag ni phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i zas kyis yul de la sred cing dga' ba skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-20: de yang phal cher te thams cad du ma yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-21: zad pa ni zas kyi ris su gtogs pa dang cha 'dra zhing mthun pa'i yon tan gyis yul de sred pa skyed par byed de /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-25: mngar ba la dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-26: mkhris pa 'phel bas grang ba dang bsil ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-27: bad kan 'phel ba ni kha ba dang rtsub pa la sred pa skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-28: de la zad pa la rlung zad pas snum pa dang lan tshva'o //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-29: mkhris pa zad pas ni skyur ba la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-30: bad kan zad pas ni zas snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:148a-31: mngar ba la sogs pa la dga' ba skyed par byed pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nam chos nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:148a-32: de lta bu'i nyes pa'i rang bzhin ni sman pa mi mkhas shing ;
