T13TD4312.1E:278a-26: dbang po rnams gsal zhing dang ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-27: de nyid ni dbang po'i yul 'dod cing yul la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-28: zas 'ju ba ni pho ba'i me drod la bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-29: de'i shugs ni nus pa la bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-30: zas 'ju ba de thogs pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-31: zil gyis mi non par bde bar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-32: de bzhin du bde ba dang ldan pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-33: nad med pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278a-34: de bzhin du stobs dang lus rgyas pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i mi ni nad khrag yongs su dag pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.1E:278a-35: yan lag brgyad pa'i snyong po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-0: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya @278b ba ;
T13TD4312.1E:278b-1: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nye bar sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-2: le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-4: // / de nas zug rdu dbyung ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-6: 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-7: nad khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-8: de ni gtar ga gdab pa'i thabs kyis dbyung dgos pas gong du bshad pas na de'i 'og tu khong du mtshon lus pa zug rdu zhes bya ba yang dbyung dgos pas de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-9: zug rngu'i bgrod pa rnam lnga ste //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-10: yo drang thad ka steng dang 'og / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-11: zug rdu ste mtshon lus pa'i bgrod pa'i lam ni /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-12: yo ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas rnam pa lnga yod par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-13: kha gnag skrangs dang nad dang bcas //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-14: yang dang yang du khrag 'dzag la //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-15: rma yi nye 'khor mtho zhing glo //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-16: chu bur lta bu'i thor bu 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-17: sha ni 'jam gyur lus mdor na //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-18: khong na zug rngu yod shes bya //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-20: khong pa'i nang na mtshon yod pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-21: mdor na 'di ltar shes par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-23: rma'i sgo ba gnag cing dri ma can dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-24: de bzhin du rma skrang zhing na ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-25: de bzhin du yang dang yang 'dzag cing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-26: de bzhin du rma'i nye 'khor dpangs su mtho zhing glo ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-27: chu'i chu bur lta bur thor bu 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-28: de bzhin du sha mdangs 'jam zhing sha snyi bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-29: khyad par du ni pags par na //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-30: mtshon lus mdog nyams srab dang //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-33: khyad par ram bye brag tu pags pa'i nang du mtshon lus pa ni pags pa'i mdog mi sdug par 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-34: sra zhing mkhrang bag tu gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-37: nad dang skrangs pa lhag par 'phel //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-38: btsir bar mi bzod smin pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-39: rma yi sgo ni 'drub mi shes //
T13TD4312.1E:278b-42: sha la gnas pa ni lhag par na zhing skrangs pa'i tshabs lhag par 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:278b-43: btsir zhing mnan par mi bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-1: pa der smin zhing rnags pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-2: zug rdu zug pa'i rma'i kha 'dru bcing 'tsho mi shes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-3: nya yi nang zug shar zug dang //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-4: 'dra las skrangs bag med pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-6: byin pa la sogs pa'i nya'i nang du gnas pa'i zug rngu'i mtshan nyid ni sha la zug pa dang 'dra ba las skrangs bag med de /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-7: de ma gtogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-8: de la lus pa nya zhes bya ba'i sha lnga brgya yod par 'og nas bshad de /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-9: sha'i char gtogs pa zla ba zla ba tshes pa la sogs pa'i dbyibs can la nya zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-10: chu ba 'dri ba'i nang lus pa'i //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-11: chu ba las ni dbyung dka' zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-12: bsgul dka' bskyod tshe rengs shing na //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-14: chu ba'i dra ba'i nang du mtshon lus pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-15: chu ba las dbyung bar dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-16: bsgul bar dka' zhing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-17: bskyod pa'i tshe lhag par mi bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-18: shing ltar rengs shing 'jas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-19: na ba lhang lhang por byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-20: zug rngu 'di ni lhag par 'byung dka' par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-21: rtsa la brten pa rtsa skrangs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-23: zug rdu rtsar gnas pa ni rtsa skrangs shing spom bag tu 'gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-24: bu ga'i sbubs gnas sbubs kyis ni ;
T13TD4312.1E:279a-25: / rang gi las dang yon tan nyams //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-27: bu gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni rang gi gnas dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-28: yon tan las nyams par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-29: de yang bu ga'i sbu bas ni dbugs dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-31: dri ma dang chu rnams rgyu ba'i gnas bcu gsum mo ;
T13TD4312.1E:279a-32: / de dag rang gi las dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-33: de bzhin du yon tan nyams shing 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-34: rtsa chen gnas pa dbugs dang khrag / lbu ba can du 'byung 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-35: sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-36: snying dang yan lag na bcas 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:279a-38: rtsa chen po sbubs can du gnas pa'i zug rngu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-39: sbubs dang khrag 'dres pa lbu ba can du 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-40: dbugs dang rlung de sgra dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279a-41: snying ga na zhing mer mer por sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-0: yan lag na zhing snyom pa dang bcas par 'gyur @279b ro ;
T13TD4312.1E:279b-1: / rus tshigs bog rer mtshon lus pa //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-2: rus brtse tshabs cher na bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-4: rus pa'i tshigs kyi bog rer mtshon gyi dum bu lus pa ni rus pa shin tu brtse zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-5: bskyod cing bsgul ba na shas chen por na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-6: rus gnas nad mang skrang bar byed //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-8: mtshon gyi zug rdu rus pa'i nang na gnas pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-9: nad mang po sna tshogs pa skyed par byed de /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-13: gnod cing zug par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-14: de bzhin du skrang par byed par yang 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-15: tshigs la gnas pa de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-16: bskyod par dka' ba dag tu 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-18: tshigs la gnas pa'i zug rdu ni rus par gnas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-19: de bzhin du bskyod par dka' zhing bsgul mi bzod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-20: nang grol nang yod 'khrugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-21: spo zhing kha zas ngan skyugs gcin //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-24: nang grol gyi nang du lus pa'i mtshon ni /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-25: 'khrug cing rgyu ma'i sgra krug krug zer ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-26: spos shing dbugs kyis rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-27: de bzhin du kha zas dang /
T13TD4312.1E:279b-29: gcin rma'i khar 'byung zhing snang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-30: gnad kyi nang du mtshon lus pa //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-31: gnad zug mtshan nyid las shes bya //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-33: gnad rnams kyi nang du mtshon lus pa'i zug rngu ni gnad du zug cing bsnun pa'i mtshan nyid gang dag bshad pa de'i tshul las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-34: pags pa la sogs rang rang gi / ji ltar 'dzag las shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-36: pags pa la sogs pa nas gnas kyi nang du mtshon gyi dum bu lus pa dag sngar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de dag las shes par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rang rang gi gnas las ji ltar 'dzag pa las kyang zug rngu yod bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-37: skyon med lus kyi rma 'tsho ste //
T13TD4312.1E:279b-38: de ni gnod pa med par gnas //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-2: gongs [?] nas slar yang gnod pa skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-4: skyes bu lus la nad kyi skyon med pa'i zug rngu de rjes mthun par gnas pa dag gi rma yang 'tsho bar byed cing gnod pa med par 'gyur mod kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-5: rma 'tsho zin nas kyang nad gzhi 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-7: rtsol bas bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis glongs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-8: slar yang lus la gnod pa skyed cing nad du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-9: gang yang rung bar bags pa nyams //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-10: bsku dang mnye dang dugs byas nas //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-11: mdog dmar na zhing tsha la 'khrug / yang na gang du mar bzhag 'ju //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-12: lde gus byugs pa myur du bska mas //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-13: gnas der zug rdu bcas shes bya //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-15: zug rngu pags pa'i nang du zug cing mi mngon par 'gyur ba ni lus kyi phyogs gang du zug par pags pa nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-16: bsku ba la sogs pa byas pas ni mdog dmar pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-18: tsha ba dang 'khrug cing bskyod pa na na bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-19: de lta bu'i gnas de ni /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-20: zug rngu dang bcas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-21: yang na pags pa'i phyogs gang du na sar mar bzhag na myur du 'ju bar 'gyur pa 'am /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-22: lde gus byugs pa myur du bskams par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-23: gnas de yang zug rdu dang bcas par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-24: shar lus sbyang ba byas pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-25: skem byas lhongs [?] gyur bsgul ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-26: btsan dmar sogs kyis shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-28: zug rdu sha'i nang du lus pa mi snang bar gyur pa ni sbyang ba bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-29: slon sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa byas pas lus bskam zhing sbeg par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-30: skems par byas pa des lhongs shing yang bag tu gyur pa dang bskul ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-31: btsan dmar bo yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-32: na ba la sogs pa'i zug rngu yod par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-33: nya dang rus tshigs nang grol gyi //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-34: zug rngu'ang de bzhin shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:280a-36: nya dang rus pa'i tshigs la gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280a-37: nang grol na gnas pa'i zug rngu ni slon sman la sogs pa'i sbyang bas skems por byas te /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-0: lhongs par gyur pa @280b pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-2: btsan pa la sogs pas na bar gyur pa gang na yod pa de na zug rdu yod par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-3: sha la zug rngu dang 'dra bar shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-4: rus pa zug rngus ma rungs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-5: rus pa bsku dang dugs bya zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-6: mnye dang btsir las shes par bya ;
T13TD4312.1E:280b-8: rus pa'i nang du lus pa'i mtshon mi mngon par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-9: rus pa ma rungs shing mdog nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-10: rus pa bsku ba la sogs pa bya ba na gnod pa yod pa las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-11: rus tshigs gnas pa rus 'dra dang //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-12: brkyang dang bskum pas shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-14: rus pa'i tshigs la gnas pa'i zug rdu mi mngon pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-15: rus pa dang 'dra bar bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-16: dugs bya ba la sogs pas shes par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-18: bskum ba'i bsgul bskyod las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-19: chu ba rtsa dang rtsa chen sbubs //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-20: zug rngu mi mnyam la ma 'gro dang //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-21: shing rta chag pa'i rta dang ni //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-22: ldan par nad pa bskyon nas su //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-23: myur du drangs nas de nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-24: bskyod pas zug rdu shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-26: chu ba la sogs par nu bcing mi mngon pa'i zug rngu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-27: mi mnyam pa'i lam ni lam mtho dma' can du shing rta 'khor lo chag pa /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-28: rtas drangs pa la bskyod nas de'i 'og tu myur du drangs te /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-30: de nas bskyod pa des rtsa dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-31: rtsa ba la sogs pa nas /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-32: zug rngu gang na yod pa shes par bya zhing brtag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-33: gnad zug logs shig ma bshad de //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-34: de rnams sha sogs la gnas yin //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-36: gnad du zug cing mi snang bar gyur pa'i zug rdu'i mtshan nyid ni logs shig tu ma bshad de /
T13TD4312.1E:280b-37: de rnams ni sha la sogs pa nyid la gnas par sngar bshad pas logs shig tu dgar med do //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-38: sbyir ni zug rngur bcas bskyod pa'i //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-39: bya bas nad bcas las shes bya //
T13TD4312.1E:280b-41: sbyir na lus kyi phyogs gang na zug rdu yod cing nang na mtshon lus pa dang bcas pa ni bskyod pa'i bya bas shes la glang po che'i rgyab dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-10: mchil ma drag tu 'dor ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-13: 'byung ba dang na ba dang bcas pa las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-14: mdor na zlum dang gyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-15: zur bzhi pa dang zur gsum pa'i //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-16: rma yi dbyibs las zug rdu ni //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-17: mi mngon rnam par shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-20: mi mngon pa'i zug rdu brtag ces bya ba'i thabs ni /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-22: gyes shing ngos gnyis tha dad par bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-24: zur gsum par gnas pa'i rma'i dbyibs las zug rngu'i dbyibs dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-25: rnam par mi mngon pa dag shes par bya zhing rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-26: de rnams dbyung ba'i thabs gyur gnyis /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-27: phyir drang ba dang mdun nas drang //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-29: zug rngu ste thams cad dbyung ba'i thabs ni gnyis kho na ste /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-30: phyir drang ba dang mdun nas drang ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-31: rtse nas drang dang rtsa nas drang //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-32: de las bzlog pas dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-34: de gnyis las bzlog pa'i thabs yin pas na /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-35: go bzlog pa'i tshul gyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-36: de bas na sna nas drang ba dang rtse mo nas drang ba'i thabs gnyis kyis drang bar bya ba yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-37: mdun nas drang ba ni rtsa ba nas drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-38: de yang de bzhin du thur du zug pa'i zug rngu'i rtse nas drang bar bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-39: gyen du zug pa ni rtsa ba nas drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-40: de ltar na gcig la gcig bcos pa'i thabs kyis zug rngu dbyung bar bya ste //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-41: dbyung sla gang na yod dral te //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-42: de nas thad kar drang bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:281a-44: mtshon 'phred du zug pa dag ni /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-45: lus kyi phyogs gang na yod par dral te /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-46: dbyung sla bar bya la de nas gnas de las thad kar drang zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-48: mtshon ni brang dang mchan khung dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281a-49: brla drung rtsib logs zug pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-0: mdun drang rtse mo mngon gcad @281b bya ;
T13TD4312.1E:281b-1: / kha zheng che drang mi bya dang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-3: zug rngu brang na gnas shing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-4: de bzhin du mchan khung dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-5: brla drung na gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-6: rtsib logs su zug pa rnams stobs kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-7: de bzhin du mdun nas drang bar mi bya'i phyir drang bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-8: rtse mo 'bur 'bur por phyir mngon pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-9: kha gcad par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-10: kha zheng che ba gang yin pa de ni stobs kyis drang bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-11: zug rngur ma gyur mde'u dang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-12: mi mngon gnod med pa mi dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-14: zug rngur ma gyur cing gnad du ma zhen la ;
T13TD4312.1E:281b-17: bzhag pa ste gnad gsum du zhugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-18: mtshon mi mngon zhing mi snang yang gnod pa med de /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-19: skrang ba dang na ba dang rnags pa med par gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-20: zug rdu de dbyung bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-21: de nas lag pas zin gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-22: lag pa gnyis kyis drang bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-24: de nas zhes bya ba ni bkra shis pa'i don te zug rngu'i rnam pa lag pas zin cing gzung du rung ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-25: lag pa gnyis kyis drang zhing gzung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-26: snang gzhan seng ge chu srin dang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-27: par mi ta ka'i mchu yis drang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-29: zug rngu gang snang bar yang gyur cing snga ma las gzhan pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-30: lag pas zin par ma gyur pa dag ni /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-31: seng ge'i mchu 'dra ba la sogs pa'i cha spyad kyis drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-32: mi mngon rma yi dbyibs las ni //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-33: gal te dbyung bar nus gyur pa //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-34: kang ka bring ga khrung khrung dang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-35: bya rog shar bya'i mchus drang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-37: gang zug rngu nyid ni mi mngon la /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-38: rma bya'i dbyibs las lus gang na gang gnas pa'i phyogs de las gal te dbyung du rung zhing nus pa yin na lus kyi phyogs de las kang ka la sogs pa'i mchu 'dra ba'i cha spyad kyis drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-39: pags sogs la gnas skam pas drang //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-40: khong stong nang nas nya mgos dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-42: pags pa la sogs par gnas pa'i zug rngu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:281b-43: skam pa 'dra ba'i cha spyad gnyis pos drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:281b-44: sogs pa'i sgras ni shal sogs pa bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-1: sbubs can gyi nang gi pags pa la gnas pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-2: nya mgo lta bu'i cha spyad kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-5: bu ga'i phyogs su gnas pa'i zug rngu ni 'dam bu 'dra ba'i cha spyad kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-6: lhag ma gzhan gyis ci rigs drang //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-8: zug rngu lhag ma snga ma de dag gis dbyung bar mi nus pa de dag ni cha spyad gzhan 'dir smos pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-9: ma smos pa'i thur ma la sogs pas ci rigs par drang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-10: gang zhig gang dang 'tsham pa des de dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-11: yang na dang por mtshon gyis dral //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-13: de lta na yang rang drang bar ma nus na gtsags spyad kyis drang por dral zhing sha la sogs pa bcad de /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-15: de nas rma yi khrag bsal ba //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-16: byas la mar gyis dugs bya zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-17: bcings te spyod pa bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-19: de nas de'i 'og tu lus kyi phyogs la zug rngu phyung zin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-20: rma'i kha'i khrag bsal zhing phyis la mar gyis rma legs par dugs bya zhing bcings te /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-21: de'i 'og tu spyod pa sngar snum gyi cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa'i kha zas dang /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-22: spyod lam dag bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-23: rtsa dang chu bar mtshon lus pa //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-24: thur mas bskyod de dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-26: rtsa dang chu bar zhen cing chags pa'i mtshon lus pa'i zug rngu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-27: dang por thur mas bskyod cing bskul la /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-29: snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-30: chu grang gtor bas sdangs byas la //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-31: gnas gzhan phyin cing 'phags gyur na //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-32: ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-34: snying ga'i phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshon gyi zug rdu ni dang por chu grang mo gtor zhing btab pas sdangs shing skrag par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-35: sdangs pas de gnas gzhan du 'chugs shing /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-36: 'phags par gyur na ci rigs par dbyung bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:282a-37: cha spyad gang 'tsham pas dbyung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.1E:282a-38: rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-0: gzhan dag la yang de bzhin @282b bya ;
T13TD4312.1E:282b-2: mtshon dang po gang du zug pa'i rma'i sgo nas dbyung zhing gdon bar dka' ba gzhan dag la yang zug rngu de gnas gzhan du bskyod la dral te /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-4: rus par zug la rkang pa ni //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-5: gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-7: zug rdu gang zhig rus par zug par gyur pa'i mi zug rngu can de rkang pa gnyis kyis mnan la /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-8: zug rngu de cha spyad kyis drang zhing gdon bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-9: de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-10: g-yog gis dam du bzung ste dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-12: de ltar rnam pa des zug rngu dbyung ba ma nus na shin tu stobs che zhing nus pa dang ldan pa'i g-yog bsgo ba bzhin du byed pas cha spyad kyis shin tu dam du bzung ste dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-14: bkug la gzhu rgyud dam btags la //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-15: rta srab kyi ni kha lcags mthar //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-16: ma yengs pa yis dam btags te //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-17: yan lag lnga po legs bsdams nas //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-18: rta ni lcag gis gzhus nas su //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-19: brdeg cing mgo bo bteg nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-20: shugs kyis ci bzhin bstod nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-21: de ltar zug rngu dbyung ba'am //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-23: de lta na yang zug rngu dbyung bar ma nus na /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-24: mde'u'i rtsa ba dam du bkug la /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-25: gzhu rgyud kyi phyogs gcig la dam du btags shing bcings te /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-26: gzhu rgyud kyi phyogs gcig rta srab kyi kha lcags kyi yang mig la sman pas gzhan du ma yengs par dam du btags te /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-27: rta'i yan lag lnga po legs par bsdams shing dul bar byas shing de'i 'og tu rta lcag gis gzhus na /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-28: ci nas kyang mgo drag tu bteg pa'i shugs kyis zug rngu 'byin par nus pa de ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-29: yang na shing gi yal gar gdags //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-31: yang na rnam pa gong ma ltar gzhu rgyud kyi rtse mo gcig mde'u la brtod de /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-32: rtse mo gcig shing gi yal ga btud pa la brtod de /
T13TD4312.1E:282b-33: btang bas zug rngu dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:282b-34: mde'u rtsa phra bar srad bu dag / btags te zug rngu dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-0: zug rngu gang gis mde'u rtsa ba phra zhing chad par @283a * //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-1: gyur du dogs pa yin na srang bu phra mo btags te dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-2: rma skrangs mde'u rtsa mi snang na //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-3: skrangs pa legs par btsir nas dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-5: rma yi kha skrangs pas zug rngu'i mde'u rtsa ba mi snang bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-6: skrangs pa de legs par btsir zhing mnan nas dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-7: dong bu tho bas brdungs pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-8: mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-10: zug rngu mtho zhing 'phags par snang bar gyur na cha spyad dong bu zhes bya ba tho bas brdung pas dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-11: lam ma yin par byung ba gang //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-12: de nyid kyis ni rmar dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-14: tho ba de nyid kyis zug rngu bskyod la /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-15: lam ma yin pa las rang gi rgyu ba'i lam rma'i sgo dang nye bar drangs la /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-16: de'i 'og tu lam ji lta ba las dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-17: mde'u zur bcum ste dbyung ba 'am //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-18: dong bu'i kha yis dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-20: mde'u zug rngu'i zur can nam rna ba can yod na rna ba de bcum zhing bsdus la /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-22: dbyung ba'am dong bu'i khas legs par dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-23: rna ba med cing rma kha dbye //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-24: drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-26: zug rngu'i mde'u rna ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-27: rma kha bye zhing phye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-28: drang por 'dug cing thad kar gnas pa dag ni /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-29: khab long zhes bya ba'i nor bu'i khyad par bsten pas dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-30: zhu ba'i gnas song zug rngu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-31: bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-33: zhu ba'i gnas long kha chang kyi nang du zhugs pa'i zug rngu phra mo ni bkru sman btang ba nyid kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-34: rlung gnod dug dang nu zho dang //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-35: khrag dang chus gnod gzhibs pas bsal //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-37: rlung gnod pa bskyed pa la sogs pa dag ni zug rngu dang 'dra bar lus la gnod par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:283a-38: de ni gzhibs pas bsal zhing gdon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-39: gre ba'i nang zhugs zug rngu la //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-40: skud pa gre bar gzhug bya ste //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-41: padma'i rtsa bar skud pa gdags //
T13TD4312.1E:283a-42: pad rtsa zug rngu lhan cig drang //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-0: gre ba'i sbubs kyi nang du zug cing der zhugs @283b pa'i zug rngu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-1: srin bal la sogs pa'i skud pa gzhug par bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-2: de yang padma'i rtsa ba la skud ba btags te btang la de'i 'og tu padma'i rtsa ba dang zug rngu lhan cig drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-3: lcags bsregs mig chur bcug pa yi //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-4: lcags thur brtan por byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-5: rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyegs med //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-6: rgya skyegs kyis bsgos zug rngu dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-8: zug rngu rgya skyegs can dag gre ba'i sbubs las gdon pa'i thabs ni /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-9: cha spyad sbubs can gre bar bcug la /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-10: gre ba'i tshigs pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-11: chu bsil mo lcags bsregs pa'i thur ma la blugs pas de gdon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-12: rgya skyegs med pa'i zug rngu yang lcags bsregs pa'i thur ma'i rtse rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa'i smyig ma'am /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-13: dong bur bcug ste chus btab pas dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-15: gsher bas tsher ma zug pa gdon //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-16: 'phral du srad bu thogs pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-17: slon par bya'o des cig shos //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-19: skra'i tshogs bsdus pa'i gong bu ni skra shad 'dzings pa zhes bya la de 'thungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-20: gsher ba'i rtsvas chu la sogs pa'i tsher ma ste /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-22: gzhan yang de lta bu'i rus pa'i zug rngu dbyung zhing gdon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-24: de'i mod srad bu la zug rngu thogs par gyur pas de slon par bya zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-25: srad bu'i phyogs gcig tu zug rngu 'byar ba de drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-26: yang tsher ma des ni cig shos te /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-27: skra shad de drang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-28: srad bu btags shing gsher bag 'thungs pas slon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-29: kha snar drang bar ma nus na /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-30: gzhan du thur du mid par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-32: gal te kha snar gyen du zug rngu drang bar ma nus na /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-33: gzhan du na thur du mid cing nang du drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-35: zas kyis brnangs pa'i zug rngu ni //
T13TD4312.1E:283b-36: chu btung phrag par brdegs pas gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-37: zas kyis brnangs shing lkog mar chags pa'i kha zas nyid ni zug rngu 'byed bsad pas zug rngu zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:283b-38: de ni chu btung bar phrag par khu tshur brdeg pas nang du zhugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-0: @284a * // mig gi rma yi zug rngu phra /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-1: dar ram bal lam chu yis bsal //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-3: mig gi rma'i zug rngu phra mo ni /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-4: dar la sogs pa gsum gyis bsal zhing gdon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-5: mi ni chus gang kha sbub ste //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-6: sprugs pa 'am brkyang la btsir slon ba'am //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-7: thal khung brkos te mi yi ni //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-8: ske yi bar du nub par gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-10: chur lhung pa'i tshe nang du chus gang bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-11: kha sbub ste legs par sprugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-12: de bzhin du yang kha spub ste brkyang la btsir ba 'am /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-13: slon sman gyis skyug tu gzhug go //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-14: rna ba chus gang lag pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-15: mnyes la til mar rgyun blugs la //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-16: rna ba thur du bstan nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-17: brdabs pa'am yang na brngub par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-19: rna ba chus gang bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-20: lag pas legs par mnyes la /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-21: til mar gyi rgyun blugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-22: de bzhin du rna ba thur du bstan nas lag pas brdabs pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-24: rna ba'i nang du 'bu zhugs na //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-25: rna ba tshva chus bkang ba'am //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-26: tshva chu dro 'jam nyid kyis dgang //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-27: shi nas 'bu ro dbyung thabs bya //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-29: rna ba'i bu ga'i nang du rkang brgyad pa la sogs pa'i 'bu zhugs na rna ba chu tshan gyi chus dgang pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-30: tshva chu dro 'jam dag gis kyang dgang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-32: tshva chu dro 'jam du bsros pas rna ba dgang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-33: gal te 'bu ro dbyung ba'i thabs rna spabs bsal ba la sogs pa'i cho ga 'og nas smos pa dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-34: rgya skyegs can dang gser dngul sogs //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-35: 'byung khungs las byung yun rings gnas //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-36: mtshon ni phal cher lus kyi me //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-37: drod kyis 'ju bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-39: zug rngu rgya skyegs can dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-40: gser dngul gyi rang bzhin can la sogs pa 'byung khungs las byung ba'i mtshon ni /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-41: lus kyi me drod kyis 'ju bar nus pas yun ring du gnas na /
T13TD4312.1E:284a-42: mtshon de dag 'ju bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-43: sa dang 'od ma shing rva rus //
T13TD4312.1E:284a-44: so dang skra dang rdo ba 'ju //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-0: sa la sogs pa'i @284b zug rngu dag kyang lus kyi me drod kyis 'ju bar nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-1: rva dang 'od tshal lcags ta la //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-2: shing tshal zug rngu ring pos kyang //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-3: phal cher de dag tshos 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-4: khrag dang sha yis tshos par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-6: rva'i zug rngu dang 'od ma'i zug rngu dang shing gi zug rngu phal che ba dag kyang lus kyi mes tshos shing 'drul bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-7: de dag kyang sha dang khrag gis tshos shing 'ju bar byed do //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-8: zug rngu sha yi gting du zug / phyogs de tsha ba 'am med gyur na //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-9: de nas de ni snang bya'i phyir //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-10: mnye dugs sbyang dang sha 'bri brta //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-11: sman rnon bcings dang zas skom sbyin //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-12: mtshon gyis gdab cing gtsags pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-13: smin par byas nas rma dbral dang //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-14: btsal dang phye bas zug rngu dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-16: zug rngu'i rnam pa sha'i gting du zug cing nang du zug pa ni lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs de tsha zhing tshos par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-17: der gnas pa'i zug rngu ste mnye ba la sogs pa'i thabs kyis smin par byas nas dbyung bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-18: mnye ba ni lag pas mnye ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-19: bkru snan dang slon sman la sogs pas sbyang ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-20: smyung ba la sogs pas sha dbri ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-21: sha dbri thabs la sogs pas brta ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-22: sman tsha zhing rno bas bcing ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-23: zas skom rnon po sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-24: mtshon gyis btab cing gtsags pas snang bar byas nas dang po thabs de bzhin du de dag gis smin par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-26: chu tshol gyis btsal ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-27: dbye zhing gshags pas zug rngu de dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-28: zug rngu'i gnas dang cha spyad kyi //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-29: tshul ni mang pos legs brtags te //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-30: blo ldan thabs ni de dang des //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-31: shes par byas la zug rngu dbyung //
T13TD4312.1E:284b-33: zug rngu de rva dang 'od ma la sogs pa gnas te /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-34: zug pa'i gnas pags pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-35: sha la sogs pa dang cha spyad ces cha spyad bkra shis la sogs pa de rnams kyi tshul mang po 'am /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-36: rnam pa sna tshogs pas legs par brtags te shes par byas la blo dang ldan pa'i mkhas pas 'dir bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:284b-37: ma bshad pa'i thabs dang de'i bye brag shes par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-0: zug rngu'i rnam pa yang ji ltar gnas pa shes par bya @285a * //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-2: de bzhin du de dang de nyid kyis dbyung zhing gdon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-3: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-4: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-5: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-6: le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-8: // / de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-11: zug rngu la la ni dpral nas dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-12: zhes gong du bshad pas de'i phyir de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.1E:285a-13: / gtsags spyad kyis gtar ga gdab cing rma'i las su bya ba byed pas na gtar ga gdab pa'i las te /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-14: de'i cho ga ni 'di dang 'di ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-15: zhes bya ba'i tshul te de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-16: rma ni phal cher dang po ni //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-18: de bas de nyid gso bya ste //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-19: de bsil byug blugs khrag dbyung dang //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-20: legs par sbyang ba la sogs pa //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-23: rma'i mtshan nyid phal cher mang du dang po skrangs shing smin pa las rma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-24: de bas na skrangs pa de nyid gso zhing zhi bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-25: smin par 'gyur ba las bsrung bar bya ste ;
T13TD4312.1E:285a-26: ci nas kyang skrangs pa de smin cing rnags par mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'bad pa dang ldan pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-27: de ji ltar bsrung bar bya zhe na /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-28: de ni bsil dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-29: skrangs pa de tsandan gyi lde gu la sogs pa bsil sman gyis byug pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-30: bsil sman la sogs pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-31: de bzhin du gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-32: skyugs sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa btang bas legs par sbyang bar byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:285a-33: rlung la sogs pa'i nad dmigs ji lta ba dang mthun pa'i gso dpyad kyis smin cing rnags par gyur pa las bsrung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-34: thor bu ma smin skrangs drod chung //
T13TD4312.1E:285a-35: mdog 'dra sra zhing brtan par gnas //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-0: thor bu 'am skrangs @285b pa'i tshabs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-1: drod dam tsha bar shas chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-2: de bzhin mdog ni 'dra ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-3: pags pa'i mdog ma nyams shing mnyam pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-4: sra zhing mnyen bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-5: brtan zhing mi yo bar gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-6: smin tshe mdog ni 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-7: dmar zhing rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug / gas pa lta bu'i nad bcas dang //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-8: yan lag snyom zhing glal bcas dang //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-10: rims 'debs skom dad gnyid med dang //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-12: rma ltar reg na mi bzod do //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-14: skrangs par gyur pa de smin par byed pa'i tshe ni /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-15: mdog 'gyur zhing pags pa'i mdog dang mi 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-16: de bzhin du mdog rtsa dmar dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-18: rlung gis khengs shing mi 'gyur bar gnas pas na rkyal pa bus pa lta bur 'dug pa dang de bzhin du gas pa lta bu ste /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-19: bcag pa 'am bkas pa lta bu'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-20: nad dang bcas pa de khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-21: de bzhin du yan lag thams cad glal 'byung ba dang bcas par gnas pas lus grugs shing dkrum pa lta bur sems pa dang de bzhin du lus 'khrugs pa la sogs pa dang ldan ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-22: 'khrugs pa ni tshig brjod par mi nus pa'i nad kyi tshor ba rang gi nyams kyis myong ba'i tshul du ma dang ldan pa'i khams 'khrugs pa'i nad 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-23: tsha ba ni lus dang yan lag thams cad mi bzad par tsha ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-24: yi ga 'chus pa ni zas la 'dod pa med cing /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-25: mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-27: skom dad kyis gdungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-28: gnyid med cing yer ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-29: de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-30: de bzhin du mar 'khyags shing 'thas par gyur pa de'i steng du bzhag na 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-31: de bzhin du rma byung ba ltar skrangs pa smin par byed pa de'i tshe /
T13TD4312.1E:285b-32: reg na mi bzod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:285b-33: smin gyur na ba'i shugs chung zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-2: mtha' ma 'jum zhing dbus su mtho //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-3: g-ya' dang skrangs pa la sogs chung //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-4: rkyal pa yi ni chu lta bur //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-5: reg na rnag ni phan tshun rgyu //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-7: skrangs pa de smin cing rnags par gyur na na ba'i shugs chung ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-8: nad kyi rtsom pa shas chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-9: de bzhin du rnying cing snyi ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-10: mdog skya zhing dkar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-12: de bzhin du mtha' ma thog thag 'jum zhing dma' la dbus ma'i phyogs mtho zhing 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-13: de bzhin du g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-14: spangs pa la sogs pa chung zhing zhi ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-15: rkyal pa'i nang du chu blugs pa ltar gnas shing /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-16: reg cing mnan na rnag gi tshogs phan tshun rgyu zhing 'khrugs ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-17: rlung min min mkhris min tsha //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-18: med de bad kan med mi skrang //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-19: khrag med dmar bar mi 'gyur te //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-20: de bas nad khrag dang bcas smin //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-22: smin cing rnags pa de la rlung ma yin zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-24: na zhing zug par mi 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-25: mkhris pa ma yin par ni tsha zhing drod bag mi 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-26: bad kan med pas ni skrangs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-27: khrag med dmar par ni mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-28: de bas na rgyu de'i phyir na zhes pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-29: bad kan dang khrag dang bcas na /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-31: smin pa thal drags khong stong dang //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-32: nad kyis zos pas bags pa srab //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-33: gnyer ma 'jum zhing mdog gnag la //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-36: skrangs smin zin nas thal drags shing dus shin tu 'das pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-37: skrangs pa'i gnas na khong stong du 'gyur ba nad las byung ba'i rnag gis zos shing zad par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-38: pags pa srab cing rdol bar nye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-39: gnyer ma 'jum zhing pags pa 'dus pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-40: mdog gnag cing dri ma can du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286a-41: ba spu rnams kyi tshogs 'byi zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:286a-42: bad kan shas che'i skrangs pa ni //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-0: smin @286b ba gting ring khrag gis gang //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-1: de bas smin rtags gsal ma yin //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-2: skrangs pa gang du bsil gyur cing //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-3: pags mdog mi 'gyur nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-4: rdo ltar reg na sra ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-5: mkhas pas the tshom med par de //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-6: khrag gi smin pa zhes bshad bya //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-8: yang bad kan las byung ba'i skrangs ba la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-9: smin pa gting ring zhing zab pas brtag par dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-10: khrag gis gang bar gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-11: de bas na de'i smin pa'i rtags sam /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-12: mtshan ma ni gsal ba ma yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-13: shes par dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-14: yang skrangs pa'i rnam pa gang du skrangs bag bsil zhing reg na grang bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-15: pag pa'i mdog kyang gzhan du ma 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-18: rdo ltar reg na sra zhing mkhrang bag tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mkhas pas the tshom dang dogs pa med ba nyid du khrag las gyur pa'i rma smin no zhes bshad cing the tshom med pa nyid du bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-19: snying stobs nyam chung byis pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-20: thor bu smin pa'i tshabs che ba'am //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-21: gnad dang rus tshigs la sogs par //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-22: 'byung ba ma gtogs gzhan dag dral //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-24: snying stobs chung zhing phog snya zhan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-25: de bzhin du nyam chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-26: byis pa lta bu mtshon gdab mi bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-27: smin pa'i tshabs che zhing thal drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-28: de bzhin du gnad dang rus tshigs la gnas pa'i skrangs pa la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-29: rno ba dang tsha ba'i sman gyis brtol zhing dral bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-30: de yang 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma las /
T13TD4312.1E:286b-31: gu gul zar ma ba las so //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-32: khron bu dang ni phug ron rtug / thal sman 'phrod dang thal sman rno //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-33: skrangs pa smin gyur brtol bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-34: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-35: gzhan zhes bya ba skrangs pa'i rnam pa gong du smos pa ma gtogs pa gzhan dag ni gtsags bus dral ba nyid du bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-36: ma smin brtol na rtsa rgyus la //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-37: gnod cing khrag ni mang du 'byung //
T13TD4312.1E:286b-38: nad tshabs rab 'phel rma gyes pa'am //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-1: pa ma smin pa brtol zhing dral na //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-2: rtsa dang rgyus pa la gnod cing ma rungs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-3: de bzhin du khrag gi tshogs mang du 'byung zhing 'bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-4: de bzhin du nad tshabs rab tu 'phel zhing tshor bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-5: rma'i kha gyes shing bye bar 'gyur ba ba'am ;
T13TD4312.1E:287a-6: yang na rma rdol ba las byung ba'i thor bu'am /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-7: me dbal gyi nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-8: rnag ni nang du gnas gyur pa //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-9: 'phel bas rtsa rgyus sha dang ni //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-10: khrag rnams myur du sreg byed de //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-11: rtsva skam la ni me dang mtshungs //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-13: skrangs pa de smin pa thal drags kyang /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-14: dral zhing brtol ba ma byas par nang du gnas par gyur pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bas rtsa la sogs pa bsreg cing za bar byed de /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-15: dper na me mched pas rtsva'i tshogs bsregs pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-16: gang zhig ma smin brtol ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-17: gang zhig smin kyang btang snyoms 'jog / khyad par mi shes de dag ni //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-18: sme sha can 'drar shes par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-20: sman pa gang gis skrangs pa ma smin pa dag kyang mi shes pa'i dbang gis brtol zhing dral bar byed la yang sman pa gang zhig skrangs pa de smin zin kyang mi shes pa nyid kyis btang snyoms su 'jog cing brtol bar mi byed pa nyid de /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-21: de gnyi ga yang khyad par mi shes shing ma brtags par byed pa yin pas sme sha can te /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-22: khyi sha za ba'i rigs ngan dang 'dra bar dmad par bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-23: rma brtol ba yi dang por ni //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-24: kha zas phan ba sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-25: tshor ba mi bzad bzed [?] 'gyur pas //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-26: chang 'thung pa la chang blud bya //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-27: zas zos pas ni mi brgyal zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-28: nang du mtshon btab tshor mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:287a-30: rma brtol zhing gtsags bu 'debs pa'i las byed pa'i dang por re zhig 'di dag ma byas pa'i mtshon gyi las mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-31: de yang thog ma kho nar nad pa de'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-32: kha zas phan zhing mngon par dga' ba sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-33: yang mtshon gyis btab pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pa drag po de bzod par 'gyur bas /
T13TD4312.1E:287a-34: chang 'thung ba zhig yin na chang rnying pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-0: de ltar na das zan zos shing @287b longs spyad pas ni brgyal zhing 'bog par mi 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-1: de bzhin du chang rnying pa rnon po 'thungs pas ni nang du mtshon gyis btab cing brtol ba tshor bar mi 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-2: de'i sdug bsngal ba rnags nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-3: rum du bu shi rde'u chags dang //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-4: kha nad dmu rdzing can ma gtogs //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-6: nad pa rum du bu shi ba la sogs pa ni ma gtogs te /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-7: bud med rum du bu shi ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-9: kha'i nad rnams yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-10: lto da mu rdzing can la mtshon gdab par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-11: de nas yo byad kun bsags te ;
T13TD4312.1E:287b-12: / nad pa shar du kha bstan la //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-13: sman pa mngon phyogs bsdams nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-14: gnad sogs ma gtogs gtsags bus gdab //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-15: sha shugs rjes mthun shin tu rno //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-16: gtsags bu rnag phyin bar du gdab //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-17: de ni cig car gdab bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-19: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-20: bkra shis pa'i don du smos pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-21: yo byad kun bsags te zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-22: de'i tshe dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad bsags pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-28: chu 'am ras bal spangs pa'i gos kyi dum bu dang /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-41: bsil yab la sogs pa rma la dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad bsag cing nyer bsdogs su bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-42: de nas nad pa kha shar du bstan te /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-43: sman pa de la mngon par phyogs shing bltas nas /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-45: gtsags du myur du gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-46: de yang nad la sogs par gdab pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-51: rtsa bo che rnams spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:287b-52: de yang sha shugs dang rjes su mthun par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-53: shin tu rno ba'i gtsags bu gdab pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:287b-54: rnag phyin zhing snang bar gyur gyi bar du btang la /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-2: smin pa chen po yod kyang ni //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-3: rma zheng sor gnyis dral ba'am //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-4: sor gnyis pa'i zabs sor gsum gdab //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-6: smin pa shin tu che ba la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-7: rma zhing sor gnyis gdab par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-8: sor gnyis pa'i bar ram zabs brtags la sor gsum par gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-9: mdzub mo chu ba spu dag gis //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-10: gnas phyogs ji bzhin brtags pa'am //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-11: rma tshol gyis ni legs btsal zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-12: kun tu legs par brtag par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-14: rma tshol gyis kun tu legs par btsal zhing brtags la bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-15: mdzub mo la sogs pas gnas dang phyogs gang na ji ltar yod pa legs par brtag cing btsal bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-16: rma'i kha bye zhing gyes pa'i phyogs su mdzub mo g-yon pas brtag par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-17: kha shin tu bye ba ni ma yin la /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-18: sha'i gting zab pa dag ni /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-19: rma tshol gyi thur mas legs par btsal bar bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-20: gzhan dag la ni smyug ma'i sbu gu'am /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-21: padma'i chu ba la sogs pas brtag par bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-22: kha shin tu zlum pa la ni phag gi sbus brtag cing btsal nas rma btod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-24: gang du mtho ba shes byas la //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-25: de dang der ni rma btod de //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-26: legs phye phug ni med par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-27: chu dang zheng du ci nas kyang //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-28: nad ni gnas par mi 'gyur bya //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-30: lus kyi phyogs gang du rma tshol 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi phyogs der rma btod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-31: yang na gang du skrang ba'i phyogs mtho bar snang bas shes par byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-32: phyogs de dang der rma btod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-33: de yang legs par phye ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-34: logs phan tshun gyi bye brag legs par shes shing /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-35: phyed par 'gyur bar btod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-36: de bzhin du phugs 'chas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-37: rnag la sogs pa brten pa'i gnas med par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-38: de bzhin du chu ste srid dang /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-39: zheng ste rgyar ci nas kyang rnag la sogs pa'i nad gnas par mi 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:288a-40: chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan ba ste de ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-41: sman pa dpa' brtan las la myur //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-42: mtshon rno mi rtul mi 'dar la //
T13TD4312.1E:288a-43: kun tu rmongs par ma gyur pa //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-0: gtsags bus @288b 'debs pa'i las la bsngags //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-2: sman pa dpa' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-3: sman dpyad kyi mtshon gyi las byed pa la bsdags [?] shing 'dod par bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-4: de la dpa' ba ni rtul phod pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-5: brtan pa ni bag tsha ba med cing mi 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-6: las la myur ba ni lag bzo bas gtsags bu'i las myur du byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-7: mtshon rno ba ni legs par bdar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-9: mi rtul ba ni las chud mi 'dza' ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-10: mi 'dar ba ni lag pa mi 'dar ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-11: kun tu ma rmongs pa ni bya ba'i mkhas pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-12: gyen du gcad rtsa 'phral smin rtsa //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-13: rnyil dang ske rtsa lto spos dang //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-14: mchan khung dang ni mig sbubs mchu //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-15: mkhur tshos brla drung chu so rtsa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-17: dpral ba la sogs pa'i rtsa ni gtsags bu kha drang por bstan te gyen du gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-18: gzhan dag gyen du bcad na ni //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-19: rtsa dang chu ba ma rungs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-21: phyogs gzhan dag tu rtsa gyen du bcad na /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-22: rtsa dang chu ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-23: gtsags bus btab nas nad pa ni //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-24: tshig snyan chu ni bsil pa yis //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-25: dbugs byung nas ni de'i 'og rma //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-26: sor mos kun nas btsir ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-27: ska ba'i chu yis legs bkru zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-28: sman chur bcug pa'i gos kyis phyi //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-29: gu gul yungs kar aa ka ru //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-30: shing kun ka ra rgyam tsha dang //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-31: shu dag nim pa'i lo ma ni //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-32: mar du sbyar bas bdug par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-34: gtsags bu btab zin kyang de'i 'og tu nad pa la de'i tshe smra bar 'os pa'i tshig snyan pa brjod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-35: de bzhin du chu bsil ba gtor ba la sogs pas dbugs phyung nas /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-36: de'i 'og tu rnag la sogs pa'i skyon bsal bar bya ba'i phyir rma de sor mos kun nas bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-37: de'i 'og tu nad dmigs ji ltar 'tsham pa'i sman chu ska ba la sogs pas legs par bkru zhing sbyangs nas /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-38: de'i rjes la ras la sogs pa'i gos kyis chu legs par bsal zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:288b-39: de nas rma de gu gul nas nim pa'i lo ma'i bar gyi sman mar dang sbrus shing sbyar ba'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-40: til gyi lde gu mar sbrang rtsi //
T13TD4312.1E:288b-41: rang gi sman ni ji lta bas //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-1: de nas rma tshangs gzhug / de nyid kyis ni de g-yogs la //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-2: mar dang phyer sbrus bsku ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-3: de'i 'og kog tse stug po ni //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-4: gzhag ste shin tu ma yengs pas //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-5: gos kyis legs par bcings byas te //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-6: glo dang g-yas dang g-yon dag gam //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-7: steng dang 'og tu ma song bya //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-9: de nas de'i 'og tu rma'i nang du gro mde'u tshul du ras gtsang ma'i rma tshangs su byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-10: ras bal la sogs pa'i sdong bu rma'i nang du gzhug tu rung ba bcug la /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-11: de'i 'og tu nad dmigs ji lta ba'i sman gyi lde gu byug cing bsku bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-12: de bzhin du til gyi lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-14: sbrang rtsi bsku zhing til gyi lde gu dang mar dang sbrang rtsi de nyid kyis /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-15: rma'i nang na gnas pa'i rma tshangs rmar bcug pa'i ras dum la sogs pa de nyid kyis g-yogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-16: de 'ba' zhig gis de g-yogs par ma zad kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-17: snod kyi nang du phye dang mar dang chur sbrus shing lag pa'i rtse mos mnyes pa'i zan gyis kyang g-yogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-18: de'i 'og rma'i tho skor gyi steng du gos rim pa mang po las byas pa mthug po gzhag pa /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-19: shin tu ma yengs pas gos kyi dum bus legs par bcing zhing dkri bar bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-20: de yang glo g-yas sam g-yon du ma 'phyugs par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-21: rma'i steng ngam dbus su ma song bar drang zhing ya yo med par rma dkri zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-22: rma tshangs kog tse dkris mar bcas //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-23: phra zhing sra la gtsang ba la //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-24: spos kyis bdugs shing 'jam la mnyen //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-25: kham khum med cing rma la phan //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-27: gong du smos pa'i rma tshangs nang du gzhug pa'i ras dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-29: dkri ba'i ras ni sra zhing mi 'chad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-30: gtsang zhing bkrus pa las byas la /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-31: de yang gu gul la sogs pa'i sros kyis bdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-32: 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289a-34: kham khum med cing blta ba tshigs dang bral ba'i rma la phan ba de lta bu dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-35: bcings nas de yi 'og tu ste //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-36: gnod pa bzlog phyir bsrung bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-37: de rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-38: lag smi gu ha aa ti gu ha //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-39: spang spos pra ma tsa ri ni //
T13TD4312.1E:289a-40: tsha tra aa ti tsha tra dang //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-0: d'u ra ba shu dag @289b yungs kar dag / rtag tu de yi spyi bor gdags //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-2: rma bcing ba'i bar gyi las de dag byas nas /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-3: de'i 'og tu nad pa de dag la gdon la sogs pa'i gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsrung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-4: yang gnod sbyin la sogs pa de rnams la gtor ma'i kha zas ci rigs par sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-5: rtag par dus thams cad du sman 'di dag spyi bor gdags par bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-6: lag smi zhes bya ba sha mi dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-7: gu ha zhes bya ba krishna pa rni dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-8: aa ti gu ha zhes bya bas la pa rni dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-9: spang spos zhes bya ba man ji ste /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-10: ming gi rnam grangs dz'a til zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-11: pra ma tsa ri zhes bya ba bra ma aashti ka zhes bya ba'i shing dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-12: shu dag ste sman pa tsa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-13: tsha tra zhes pa sha ta pushpa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-14: aa ti tsha tra zhes bya ba bi sha ni ki dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-16: yungs kar rnams gdags par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-17: de nas snum gyi cho gar bshad /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-18: nyin re'i kun spyod bshad pa bstan //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-19: zhes bya ba de'i 'og tu skyes bu dman ma de la snum gyi bshad pa zhes pa snum btung ba'i cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-20: kha la chu dron gyis kun tu spyod pa bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-21: nyin re zhing spyad par bya ba'i le'u'i skabs su bshad pa'i kun tu spyod pa ston cing bsgo bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-22: nyin par gnyid log rma g-ya' zhing //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-25: sman ma smin par gnyid log pa ni rma g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-29: bud med dran na ma reg pa'am //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-30: mthong bas khu ba byung gyur na //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-31: ma phrad na yang 'khreg [?] pa las ;
T13TD4312.1E:289b-34: bud med dang ma phrad du zin kyang /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-35: de dran pa la sogs pa nyid kyis khu ba byung bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:289b-36: 'khrig pa las byung ba'i skyon rma bye ba la sogs pa 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-37: kha zas dag ni gang goms las //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-38: nas dang gro dang drug cu pa //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-39: sran chung mud ga tu ba ri //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-40: ni shan na ga dzi wan ti //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-41: la phug gzhon nu bar ta ka / rgya sne'u tan du li ya ka / ka ra be la kar ko ta //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-43: rgyam tsha se 'bru skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.1E:289b-44: chu bskol ba ni bsgrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-2: zos rjes chu tshan btung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290a-3: skam sa'i sha ni zos gyur na //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-6: nad pa sman ma de rjes su mthun zhing goms pa'i kha zas zos pas myur zhing rings par rma 'tsho zhing bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-7: de la nas la sogs pa ni bza' ba'i don du'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-8: sran chung la sogs pa ni sran khu yu sha dang tshod ma'i don du sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-9: tu ba ri ni sran ma aa ru ka'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-10: ni sha na ni ka dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290a-11: dzi ba na ti la sogs pa ni tshod ma'i don du'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-12: rgyam tsha dang se 'bru la sogs pa spos kyi don du'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-13: chu bskol ba bsgrangs pa ni btung ba'i don du'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-14: 'bras rnying ba ni lo gcig ma lon pa'i 'bras de'i chan no //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-15: snum can ni snum cung zad yod pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-16: de'i rjes la 'tshal nan ni chu tshan btung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-17: de bzhin du skam sa'i sha 'ur bya la sogs pa'i sha bza' ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:290a-18: de dag gis rma myur du 'tsho zhing 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-19: dus su ran par bza' ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-22: de ltar rjes su mthun pa'i kha zas ji ltar 'os pa'i dus su ran zhing 'tsham par bza' pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290a-23: phan pa zos na ba de blag tu 'ju zhing smin par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-24: ma zhu ba yis rlung la sogs //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-25: ldang zhing nad ni stobs chen 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-26: de las skrangs dang rnags ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-27: tsha dang spos par 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-29: kha zas ma zhu zhing smin par ma gyur ba las ni /
T13TD4312.1E:290a-30: rlung la sogs pa ldang zhing stobs dang ldan pa nad tshabs chen por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-31: de ldang ba de las rma skrangs pa dang na ba la sogs pas nad pa nyen par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-32: 'bru sar til dang ma sha dang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-33: chang dang rlan can las byung sha //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-34: 'o ma bur ma shing las gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-35: skyur dang lan tshva tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-36: gzhan gang 'khru ba gcod byed dang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-37: tsha dang bsil dang lci ba yang //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-39: 'bru sar pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan rma yod pa'i skyes bus spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290a-40: de bzhin du chang dang srog chags gsher sar gnas pa'i sha dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290a-45: thud la sogs pa dang bu ram shing las gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-0: bu ram phra mo @290b la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-4: gzhan yang gang dag 'khru ba gcod cing 'gags par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-5: tsha ba'i shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-8: lci bad dag kyang spang zhing dor bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-10: rma dang ldan pa'i nad kun skyed //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-12: bshad ma thag pa'i 'bru sar pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan 'di ni rma dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dman pa'i nad kun skyed pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-13: nad gzhi gsum char skyed pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-14: rma red cing 'drul ba la sogs pa nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-15: chang ni rno ba tshe rtsub 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-16: rma la myur du gnod par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-18: 'bru sar pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan 'di ni bshad ma thag par chang spang bar bya ba nyid yin par bstan zin pa las /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-19: 'dir yang chang spang bar bstan pa ni shin tu nyes pa che ba'i phyir yang smos pa yin te /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-20: 'bru sar ba la sogs pa zos pas rma la gnod par 'gyur mod kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-21: de bas kyang chang ni rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-24: skyur ba yin pas de la gnod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir rma la shin tu myur bar gnod par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-25: gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-26: yang chang khyad par can rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-28: skyur ba gang yin pa de nyid ni rma la shin tu myur bar gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-29: snum pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-31: phal cher snum bcas mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-32: shin tu rno dang rtsub ma yin //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-33: dangs shing btung bar sla ba dag / rgun chang dag las de mchog yin //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-35: de bas na chang snum pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-36: dman ma lan 'ga' zhig nyung zhing byin pa ni rma la gnod par mi 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-37: chang rno ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni shin tu gnod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-38: zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-40: bal aur shi ras g-yab cing //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-41: 'di ni bskyod par mi bya la //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-42: drag shul mi gzugs 'phrug mi bya //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-43: bskyod pa'i tshe na bag bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:290b-45: rma de sman pa la ka dang /
T13TD4312.1E:290b-46: au ra shi ras g-yab pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-1: bskul bar mi bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-2: drag shul du gzugs shing brdeg par mi bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-3: sen mo la sogs pas 'phrug par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-4: yang de bzhin du bskyod cing bskul ba'i tshe na yang bya ba thams cad du rma legs par bsrung zhing bag bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-5: mdza' dang bram ze rgan sogs kyi //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-6: gtam ni yid la dga' ba mnyan //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-7: nad las thar ba'i re bcas pas //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-12: rgan po la sogs pa'i gtam yid la dga' ba dag mnyan pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-13: nad las myur du thar bar 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.1E:291a-14: / zhes re ba dang bcas shing dga' bas rma myur du 'tsho bas 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-15: nyin gsum lon tshe rma yi tshas //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-16: slar yang bkru sogs [?] las rnams ni //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-19: de ltar byas na nyi ma gsum lon pa'i tshe slar yang rma'i las snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-20: gong gi bshad pa dang mthun par bya'i /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-21: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-23: nyin zhag gnyis par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-24: tshabs cher na zhing mi 'byar la //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-25: rma ni yun ring zhig na 'tsho //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-27: snga ma bzhin du nyi ma gnyis pa la rma bkrol zhing bkru ba la sogs pa'i las mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-28: de ltar byas na rma tshabs cher na zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-29: mi bzad par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-30: rma mi 'byar zhing rmen bu skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-31: rma yun ring du zhig na 'tsho zhing 'drub par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-32: rma tshangs sam ni lde gus glan //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-33: snum ches rtsub ches dam pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-34: lhod drags bzhag nyes mi bya ste //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-36: rma'i nang du zhugs pa'i rma tshangs ras la sogs pa'i gos kyi dum bu rma'i nang du gzhug tu rung ba de snum ches pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-38: de bzhin du dam zhing drag tu bcing ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-40: bzhag nyes pa dag mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-41: de bzhin du sman gyi lde gus rma glan pa yang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-42: snum ches pa dang dam ches pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291a-45: snum ches rma ni red par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-46: rtsub ches sha chad shin tu na //
T13TD4312.1E:291a-48: dam dang lhod drags bzhag nyes pas //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-2: snum shin tu drags shing shas che na rma red par 'gyur zhing rnag dang chu ser 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-3: de bzhin du rtsub ches pa ni sha bcad pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-4: shin tu na bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-5: de bzhin du pags pa gas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-7: de bzhin du rma tshangs dang lde gu shin tu dam pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-8: shin tu lhod drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-10: rma'i kha phan tshun 'drud cing 'dar ba dang thug par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-11: rma ni rnag bcas skrangs shing mtho //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-12: rgyu bcas rnag phugs 'chas pa dag / rma tshangs 'jam po nang gnas pa /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-13: rma yi skyon ni dag par byed //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-15: rma gang rnag dang bcas par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-16: de bzhin du skrangs shing mtho bar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-17: rgyu ba dang bcas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-18: sha la sogs pa rnag gis zos pas bu ga'i rnam pa ring du 'gro ba las /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-19: rgyu dang bcas pa zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-20: rnag ni phugs nang na 'chas shing 'thums pa yod pa ni rnag phugs 'chas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-21: de lta bu'i rma gang yin pa dag / rma tshangs 'jam po nang na gnas shing bcug pas rma'i skyon de dag dag cing sbyong bar byed pas de'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-22: de'i rma'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-23: skrangs pa ha cang ma smin brtol //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-24: smin zhing rnags par 'gyur ba spyad //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-25: phan pa'i sman dang zas sbyin dkri //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-26: shin tu rmar mi gnod pas gso //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-28: skrangs pa ha cang ma smin pa la legs bar ma brtags par gal te skrangs pa de mtshon gyis brtol bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-29: smin cing rnags pa'i thabs kyis yang dag par gso bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-30: de yang phal cher lan tshva dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-33: dro ba'i lde gu'i sman rnams dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-34: de bzhin du zas smin cing rnags par 'gyur ba'i bza' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-35: de bzhin du smin par 'gyur ba'i lo ma la sogs pa dag gis gso bar bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-36: de dag kyang rma la shin tu mi gnod par bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-37: lan 'ga' rma smin par bya ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:291b-38: rma la cung zad gnod pa btang du zin kyang skyon du mi 'gyur ba ni yod do //
T13TD4312.1E:291b-39: snad pa'i rma ni gsar du byung //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-2: rmen bu chen po bkas pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-3: rna shal bu ga chad pa btsem //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-5: rma de'i mod kho na la mtshon gyis dral zhing snad pa las byung ba ral zhing kha bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-6: de bzhin du rmen bu chen po bags pa las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-7: de bzhin rna shal gyi bu ga chad pa'ang btsem par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-8: mgo dang mig phugs sna dang mchu //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-9: mkhur tshos rna ba dpung pa brla //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-10: mgul pa dpral ba rlig pa dpyi //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-11: pho mtshan gzhang dang lto ba sogs //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-12: phugs ring ba na gnas rnams dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-13: sha che mi 'gul ma yin dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-14: chu so mchan khung la sogs dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-15: sha chung mgul pa'i rma dag dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-16: dbugs dbyung zug rngu yod pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-17: thal sman dug med tshig mi btsem [?] //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-19: mgo bo dang mig phugs la sogs par gnas pa'i rma bcom par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-21: mchan khung la sogs pa'i lus kyi gnas kyi rma btsem par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-22: de bzhin du sha chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-23: mgul pa'i rma dag kyang btsem par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-24: de bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing rgyu ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-25: nang na zug rngu yod pa'i rma yang btsem par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-26: de bzhin du thal sman dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-27: dug dang mes tshig ba'i rma yang btsem par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-28: btsem pa rus dum khrag skam dang ;
T13TD4312.1E:292a-29: / rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-30: sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba yang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-31: rang gi gnas su glan pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-32: rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzags la //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-33: skud pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-35: btsem par bya ba ni rus tshigs gsum du gnas las goms pa gang yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-36: khrag skam po la sogs ba lag pas bsal zhing bton la /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-37: de bzhin du sha chad mtshon gyis dbral te dum bur 'phyang bde yang rang gi gnas su glan zhing sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-38: de bzhin du rus pa dang tshigs la sogs pa byung zhing 'bur ba slar gzhug pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-39: khrag gi rgyun gzags shing spyad la /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-40: ci rigs par ras kyi skud pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-41: shing shun aa sman ta ka dang mur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-42: gso ma la sogs pa'i skud pa 'jam po'am /
T13TD4312.1E:292a-43: rgyas pa las byas pa'i skud pas legs par btsem par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-44: srubs ni nye ba'am ring mi bya //
T13TD4312.1E:292a-45: blang ba che ba'am chung mi bya //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-2: rma las ha cang nye ba'am /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-3: thag ring ba nas btsem par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-4: de bzhin du rma'i gnas las srubs kyi blang ba kham chung bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-5: de nas spro bsring byas nas mthar //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-6: rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-7: skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-8: 'bras bu gsum dang sa la ki / seng phrom mngar dang snum bcas pas //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-9: bskus la bcing sogs sngon bzhin bya //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-11: de ltar btsem pa'i rjes thogs la /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-12: nad pa spro ba sring zhing dbugs phyung ste /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-13: de nas de'i 'og tu rma kha sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba'i skyer ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-14: zar ma la sogs pa'i lde gu byug cing bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-16: dud pas bdug pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-17: rma kha khrag ni med gyur gang //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-18: de ni cung zad brud byas te //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-19: rma 'byor ba nyid khrag yin pas //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-20: phyung ste legs par drub par bya //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-22: rma gang zhig kha'i phyogs na khrag med par gyur pa de ni cung zad tsam brud cing /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-23: mtshon gyis gtses la khrag dbyung ba dang btsem bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-25: rma 'di 'byor zhing 'tsho bar byed pa ni khrag nyid yin pas na /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-26: de phyung ste drub bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-27: de la bcing ba yul la sogs //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-28: brtags nas nges par sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-30: 'dis rma bcing zhing dkri bar bya ba yin pas na bcing ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-31: de ni yul la sogs pa zhes pa /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-32: yul dang nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa la brtags nas /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-33: rang gi blos legs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-34: bal gos pags ba dar gsum dro //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-35: zar ma'i ras ni bsil ba yin //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-37: bal gyi gos yin pas na bal gos te /
T13TD4312.1E:292b-39: bags pa'i rnam pa 'jam zhing dro pa'o ;
T13TD4312.1E:292b-41: bcing ba gsum po 'di dag ni nus pa dro ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-42: zar ma'i ras dang gsor sa ni bsil ba yin no //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-43: dro grang ran pa shing bal 'dab //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-44: ras bal rgyus pa shing shun yin //
T13TD4312.1E:292b-46: dro ba dang grang ba gnyis ka'i rang bzhin ran pa ni shing bal 'dab ma dang /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-2: shing shun las byas pa'i chings ma ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-3: rgyu de dag las skud pa'i tshul du byas pa'i rnam pas dkris pa'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-4: zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-5: bad kan tshil ches rma la glan //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-6: chag thur shing byang pags pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-7: shing shun smyig tshal sogs pas bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-9: bad kan dang tshil ches pa'i rma la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-10: zangs ma dang lcags la sogs pa glan zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-11: rkang lag gi rus pa chag grugs su gyur pa la ni /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-12: shing byang la sogs pas bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-13: dbyibs ni rang ming mthun pa yi //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-14: chings ma bcva lnga rnams bya ste //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-15: shubs dang bkra shis lhod par bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-16: mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-17: mda' lcags khri dang dam bcing dang //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-18: sgye'u bla re lkog shal dang //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-19: 'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-20: yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-22: dbyibs kyi rnam pa rang gi ming ji skad btags pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-23: rjes su mthun pa'i chings ma sgye'u dang /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-24: bkra shis nas yan lag lnga'i bar bcva lnga po de dag bcing ba'i don du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-25: de dag kyang shubs ni mdzub shubs 'dra ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-26: sor mo'i tshigs gsum pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-27: bkra shis ni g-yung drung lta bu zur bzhi pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-34: rtsva la sogs pa las lhas bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-35: de dag ni mgul ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-36: pho mtshan la sogs pa la rma byung ba la glan bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-37: mthar chags su bcing ba ni ras bal la sogs ba zheng chung la ring ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-38: de ni ming gi grar sbyar par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-39: zlum por bcing ba ni srad bu ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293a-40: de ni yan lag thams cad bcing ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293a-41: mda' lcags ni gang ring por byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-0: de yang lag ngar la sogs pa la sbyar bar @293b bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-1: khri ni khri rkang bzhi par byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-2: de ni 'gram pa dang mur 'gram dang mkhur tshos snad pa la sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-3: dam du bcing ba ni khyad par du 'dug mi shes par bcing ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-4: de ni lto ba dang brla'i rgyab tu glan zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-5: sgye'u ni so rtsi la sogs pa'i 'jud pa'i sgye'u phran te /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-6: de ni sor mo dang pho mtshan gyi rtsa la nad yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-7: gcin nad za khu can la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-8: bla re ni nyi tshan la sogs pa'i gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-9: ras bal la sogs pas khebs pa lta bu ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-10: pho mtshan skrangs pa la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-11: ba lang gi lkog ma lta bu ni /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-12: lkog mar lkog shal ltar 'phyang ba ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-13: de ni lus kyi yan lag 'phyang ba las gyur bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-14: 'ur mthil lta bu ni zhing pa rnams bya skrod pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-15: 'ur rdo 'phen pa'i rdo'i gnas su byed pa 'ur mthil zhes bya'o /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-16: de ni rna dang chu dang ko sko nad pa la sbyar zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-17: zur du glan pa ni gang du byang gcig dbus su skabs btod de /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-18: rma gnyi ga 'dab chags su bcing du rung ba'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-19: de ni rma gnyis 'dab chags su byung ba la glan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-20: zlum po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ltar zlum por byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-21: de ni yan lag zlum bor snang cing chag pa la glan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-23: shing byang la sogs pa gang yan lag bzhi po yod cing gyen du dbyung pa bya ste /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-24: de ni nam tshong yan chad snad pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-25: de las gang zhig gang legs 'byor //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-26: de ni de ru legs par sbyar //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-28: bcing ba de dag gi nang nas /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-29: ching ma gang zhig lus kyi phyogs gang dang legs par 'byor zhing 'byar la 'tsham pa'i chings ma shugs la sogs pa de dag ni /
T13TD4312.1E:293b-30: lus kyi phyogs de ru legs par sbyar zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-31: brla dang mjug tsos mchan khung dang //
T13TD4312.1E:293b-32: chu so spyi bor dam du bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-0: brla dang mjug tsos la sogs pa ni lus kyi @294a * //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-1: phyogs su rma byung ba la ni dam zhing sra bar bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-2: lhod par bcing bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-3: lag ngar gdong dang rna ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-4: rgya ba dang rtsi ba logs mgul pa lto //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-5: pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-7: lag ngar la sogs pa'i lus kyi phyogs su ni bcing ba dam lhod ran par bya la /
T13TD4312.1E:294a-8: de bzhin du pho mtshan dang rlig pa yang ran pa tsam du bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-9: mig dang tshigs su lhod bar bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-11: mig gi phyogs dang rus pa'i tshigs rnams su chings ma lhod par bcing ngo //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-12: lhod bcings rma ni bad kan dang //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-13: rlung shas che la ran par bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-15: lhod bar bcing ba mig dang tshigs la rma bad kan dang rlung gi shas che ba yod na lhod par na tsam du bcing ngo //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-16: ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-17: dam zhing shin tu dam par bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-19: ran par bcing pa'i gnas lag ngar la sogs par /
T13TD4312.1E:294a-20: bad kan dang rlung gi shas che ba'i rma yod na /
T13TD4312.1E:294a-21: ran par mi bcing gi dam du bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-22: dam du bcing ba'i gnas brla dang mjug tsos la sogs pa'i rma bad kan dang rlung las byung ba yin na /
T13TD4312.1E:294a-23: shin tu shas cher dam du bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-24: dgu na dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-25: zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-27: bad kan dang rlung gi shas che ba'i rma de gnyis las dgun zhes bya ba dgun stod dang dgun smad /
T13TD4312.1E:294a-28: de bzhin du dpyid kyi tshe ste /
T13TD4312.1E:294a-29: zla ba drug la ni zhag gsum nas dgrol zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-30: khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-31: dam bcing gnas su ran par bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-32: ran bcing gnas su lhod par bcing //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-33: lhod bcing gnas su bcing mi bya //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-35: khrag dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rma la ni dam du bcing ba'i gnas brla la sogs par dam du mi bcing ran bar bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294a-36: ran par bcing ba'i gnas lag ngar la sogs par ni lhod par bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-0: lhod par @294b bcing ba'i gnas mig dang tshigs su khrag dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rma byung na de bcing bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-1: de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-2: snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-4: khrag dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i rma de gnyis la so ga dang ston ka'i tshe ni nyin re zhing snga dro dang phyi dro'i dus su dgrol zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-5: ma bcings sha sbrang sbrang bu dang //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-6: lhags pa ser bu sogs pas gnod //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-7: rma red gyur cing der snum dang //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-8: sman ni yun rings gnas mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-9: sbyang pa'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-10: 'tsho ba kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-12: rma ma bcings na sha sbrang la sogs pas gtses par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-13: de dang reg pa'i dbang gis 'tshe ba la sogs kyis gnod par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-14: de bzhin du rma de bcing ba med par snum gyis bskus na yang sman de yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-15: sman gyi lde gu la sogs pa bskus pa yang yun ring por mi thogs par bskams pa'am lud par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-16: de bzhin du legs bar bcos su zin kyang rma 'tsho zhing 'drub bar dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-17: gal te 'tsho zhing 'drub kyang sha mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-18: bcings na chag cing phye mar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-20: rtsa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-21: rma ni myur du bde bar 'tsho //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-22: ldang dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-23: spyod lam kun la gnod pa med //
T13TD4312.1E:294b-25: rma legs par bcings shing bsdams pas ni /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-26: chag cing phye mar grugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-29: dral zhing gas par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.1E:294b-30: rtsa dang rgyus pa chad par gyur kyang /
